description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。概念性的介紹精密機電系統以及精密加工程序，工件精密度介紹，誤差與公差 (尺寸精度、組裝誤差)，移動平台 (XY-Stage) 之選用，滾珠螺桿與線性滑軌選用與承重計算，真直度與平行度介紹，位置控制與馬達選用。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the concepts of precision mechanical systems and precision fabrication process. The concepts of mechanical errors and tolerance of products and the key points of selecting of XY-stages, driving units, ball screws, and linear motion elements will be also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 就基本光學及人體工學之視覺基本理論及測試方法，以確立照明之質與量的標準，先就現有燈泡、燈管、燈具作整體性之介紹並就其特性比較，從而建立選擇之標準，不僅要求光的亮度，並且綜合考慮光的品質，燈具的安全性，經濟效益、能源的節約及燈具設計，針對亮度的計算，介紹三種不同的計算方法，以供設計使用，綜合前述之重點，就商業、工業、戶外及特性照明等設計，逐一以實例說明，並兼述燈具之控制線路及有關法令。
description.en: Course Title:Design of LightingDescription:This course is designed for one-semester program in thelighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce thesoftwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lighting equipements.lighting design, transmission system. and distribution system) and howto maintain these equipments.

description.zh: 此課程之目標為多媒體系統整介紹，包含介紹所有影像和視訊的標準格式、視訊的壓縮基本原理，目前主流的視訊壓所標準格式，讓學生了解到 1. 多媒體簡介 2. 多媒體發展平台 3. 多媒體資訊系統設計 4. 多媒體資訊系統實體建置。課程內容包含: 1. 多媒體資料簡介 2. 多媒體發展平台 3. 多媒體資料處理 4. 多媒體壓縮技術 5. 多媒體標準架構 6. 多媒體系統設計 7. 多媒體實體建置
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the Multimedia Systems, including: (1) Introduction to Multimedia Systems (2)Multimedia Platforms for developers (3)Digital Signal Processing for Multimedia Systems (4) Data and Image Compression for Multimedia Systems (5) Multimedia Frameworks (6) Design of Multimedia Systems (7) Develop and Manage Multimedia Systems

notes: 電子三四甲乙、四丙合開

description.zh: 1. 科技創新與策略 2. 研究與創新手法 3. 研發流程設計 4. 研發流程管理 5. 新產品開發 6. 設計審查 7. 設計研究 8. 研發策略 9. 品質機能展開 10. 品質企劃 11. 成本企劃 12. 技術企劃 13. 資料庫建立
description.en: 1.Technology, innovation and strategy2.Research and innovation method3.Research and development process design4.Research and development process control5.New product development6.Design review7.Design research8.Research and development strategy9.Quality functional development, QFD10.Quality design11.Cost design12.Technology design13.Research and development database

notes: 電子四甲乙丙合開，創創學程

description.zh: 本課程由學生與老師共同選定題目，在特定題目下對此專題之問題定義，分析，推理，設計，製作與解決方法進行研究，以完成該專題之成品，專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品，以培養實務工作之能力。專題範圍包含：1. 電子電路，2. 電子儀表，3. 控制與通訊系統，4. 電子視聽系統，5. 微電腦為基礎之計算機硬體（含軟體）製作，6. 軟體設計與製作（PC，工作站），影像處理與計算機視覺，多媒體製作（動畫、Video、Audio 及其整合），9. 其他。
description.en: In this course,students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor.The topic of this project,selected and decided by bath the student and his advisor,could be chosen form(but not limited to) 1.Electronic circuits 2.Electronic instrumentation 3.Communication and control systems 4.Microprocessor applications 5.Multimedia system designs 6.Computer networks 7.Computer software desgin .

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來分析與模擬類比及數位積体電路，進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路的能力，課程內容包念：1. 電腦輔助設計積体電路介紹 2. 類比積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 (SPICE Design center) 3. 數位積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( Viewlogic ) 4. PLD 的認識與介紹 5. FPGA ( Xilinx ) 的設計 6. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore,the student have the design capability of integrated.The contents of this course :1.introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.Introduction to the computer-aided deaign of analysis    integrated circuits(SPICE ,Deaign Center)and computer-  exercise3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits(Viewlogic)and computer-exercise4.Introduction to the PLD5.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise6.Project.

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Integrated Circuits

description.zh: 1. 簡介：概觀、資訊源、通道、通訊品質、數位通訊系統 2. 信號與系統：傅立葉轉換、線性系統 3. 類比數位變換：取樣、量化、脈碼調變 4. 機率與隨機程序 5. 基頻脈波傳送：相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型、等化 6. 數位通頻傳輸：ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MSK7. 多工與展頻技術：分頻多工、分時多工、直序列與跳頻分碼多工 8. 源編碼：熵、資料緊縮、霍夫曼編碼、資料壓縮、JPEG9. 通道編碼：線性區塊碼、迴旋碼
description.en: 1.introduction :overview,information sources,channels,quality measurement,a closer look of modern digital communication systems2.Signals and Systems:Fourier transform,linear systems3.A/D Conversion :sampling ,quantization ,PCM4.Probability and Random Process5.Baseband Pulse Transmission :matched filters,ISI and shaping ,qeualization6.Digital Passband Transmisson:ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MAK7.Multiplexing and Spread Sprctrum   Techniques:FDMA,TDMA,direct sequence and frequency hopping   CDMA8.Source Coding:entropy ,data compaction,Huffman coding,data   compression,JPEG9.Channel Coding :linear block codes,convolutional codes

description.zh: 1.2G~4G 通訊系統介紹 2. 行動電話傳輸介面 3. 元件表面黏著技術 4. 發光二極體應用與電路設計 5. 電激發光應用與電路設計 6. 靜電原理特性與保護元件 7. 積體電路元件包裝與記憶體元件介紹 8. 無線通訊網路 9. 智慧型行動電話生產流程與測試流程 10. 智慧型行動電話研發測試項目
description.en: 1. 2G~4G Telecommunication Systems Introduction 2. Transmission interface of Mobile Phone 3. Surface Mount Technology of component 4. Light Emitting Diode application and circuit design 5. Electro Luminescent application and circuit design 6. Electrostatic Discharge Characteristic and protection component 7.Integrated Circuit component package and Memory component Introduction 8. Wireless Communication network 9. Smart Mobile Phone Production Process and Test Process 10. Smart Mobile Phone Research Test Item

name.zh: 智慧型行動電話原理與實務設計
name.en: Smart Mobile Phone Principle and Practical Design

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討供應鏈管理相關之基本議題。供應鏈管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，對整個製造與配銷通路的整合性管理策略。本課程內容包含供應鏈管理之策略發展、供應鏈管理之相關功能、及供應鏈管理之主要困難點。本課程將同時探討與供應鏈管理相關之議題，如存貨理論、資訊系統整合、及供應契約等。本課程理論與實務並重、案例研討也將為本課程重要之一環。
description.en: This course intends to introduce fundamental issues regarding supply chain management. Supply chain management is an integrated approach to manage the total flow of manufacturing and distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The contents of this course include the development of supply chain management strategies, supply chain management functions, and major challenges of supply chain management. Certain topics related to supply chain management, such as inventory policy, information system integration, and supply contract will also be addresses. This course focuses on both theoretical and practical issues. Real world case study will be an important part of this course.

notes: 工管四甲乙丙合開丙 20 人

description.zh: 本課程包含 ERP 系統演進，全球運籌管理，ERP 系統軟硬體結構，及企業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, global logistic strategy, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and enterprise management intelligence system.

notes: 工管四甲乙丙合開丙 20 人，待聘

description.zh: 為加強學生設計實務能力，本課程規劃學生赴家具相關產業，至少為期 4.5 個月之校外實習，並於期滿後須由接受實習單位提具實習證明及成績考核。次一學期開學後，學生必須繳交書面或經口頭實習成果發表，由指導教師檢核實習單位成績考核，以給予實習學生最後評量成績。
description.en: For the purpose of enhance senior students' practical skill in design, the course is established to encourage students to intern in the industry for no less than 4.5 months. The student will then be evaluated by the industry, and by the lecturer through the examination of a written report and/or an oral presentation to demonstrate his/her effort.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。學生需每週 40 小時於企業實習，並於期末繳交實習報告。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 電池分類，電池化學，電池功能及表現，電池之製造，電池使用注意事項，電池檢驗及測試，電池選擇及安裝，燃料電池，電動車使用之電池未來高級電池之介紹。
description.en: Battery Classification，Battery Chemistry，Battery Function and Performance，Battery Manufacturing，Battery service Precautions，Battery Inspection and Testing，Battery Selection and Installation，Fuel Battery， Battery for the Electric Vehicle，Introduction to the Advanced Future Battery.

description.zh: 本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 近年來由於台灣在半導體、平面顯示器、光電、薄膜、低溫冷凍、生物科技及微奈米技術等產業的蓬勃發展，因而帶動了真空設備相關產業，進而對真空科技及其專業人才需求日殷。本課程將針對上述產業所使用的相關真空設備進行講解及討論，包含有真空蒸鍍系統、真空濺鍍系統、真空冷凍乾燥系統、電漿蝕刻真空系統、真空熱處理系統、表面分析技術等，將使學生具備真空設備理論及實務的相關知識與技能。
description.en: The vacuum industry is growing fast in the past two decades because of the highly growing of the high-tech industries including semiconductor, optics-electrics, communication, MEMS, and nano-technology. Therefore, a lot of students need to know the vacuum system described previously. This program will introduce vacuum systems including vacuum evaporating system, vacuum sputtering system, vacuum drying system, vacuum plasma etching system, surface analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012 或負責教授同意。介紹各種不同分析方法（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理）、破壞理論、材料選用、可靠度概念、軸及軸承、離合器及煞車器、傳動元件 (如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪)、軸聯接器、飛輪、彈簧等。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME212 or Consent of Instructor Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, and Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Incompressible fluid, mass conservation, invoiced flow, Bernoulli principle, linear, angular momentum conservation and application, vortex, and potential flow, Navier-Stoke equation, pressure loss, boundary layer flow, separation flow, lift and drag, Reynold analogy and applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。經選定後之題目在第一學期修完時如欲換題目時須在第一學期成績打出後，再徵求原來及新接手老師都同意才可更換題目。
description.en: The topic of the special project is discussed and decided together by the students and the advisor. Under the face-to-face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester. The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生至機械相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative mechanical engineering company, practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

notes: 職訓局已開課，停開【停開】

description.zh: 1. 阻抗匹配器 2. 濾波電路 3. 小訊號放大器 4. 弦波訊號產生器 5. 晶體振盪器 6. 混波器
description.en: 1. Impedance matching circuits2. Filters3. Small-signal amplifiers4. Sinusoidal wave generators 5. Crystal oscillators5. Mixers

notes: 五選三實驗，已修滿三門，停開【停開】

description.zh: １. 組合分析２. 機率理論３. 隨機變數４. 隨機變數函數５. 機率分佈６. 期望值性質７. 樣本分佈８. 假設檢定９. 線性迴歸分析１０. 變異數分析
description.en: 1.Combinatonal Analysis2.Pribability Theory3.Random Variables4.Functions of Random variables5.Probability Distribution 6.Properties of Expectation  7.Sampling Distribution 8.Tests of Hypotheses9.Linear Regression Analysis10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉轉換 2. 離散及快速傅利葉轉換 3.IFR 濾波器 4.FIR 濾波器 5. 專題
description.en: 1.Fourier Series and Transform2.DDFT and FFT3.IIR filter4.FIR filter5.Special projects

notes: 職訓局已開課，停開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習 18 週，每週不得低於 2.5 天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 任何計畫、產品或服務之壽命週期起始自需要分析，其次為決定需求和規格，接著為設計和執行，最後經由使用階段，在支援和維護下完成此計畫。而在進行經濟分析，應對貨幣之時間價值、投資報酬率、損益平衡、公司債券、現金流量、有效利率、最小成本壽命、通貨膨脹、成本估計、折舊、所得稅、資金成本、更新分析、敏感性分析和風險決策分析等要點，以求估計值之準確性、方案抉擇決策之正確性。
description.en: Engineering / management analysis of the economic aspects of public and private project proposals. Decisions involving the expenditure of capital funds. Alternative sources of funds; time value of money; methods of evaluating alternative project.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為 2 學分。人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
description.en: Human factors is dedicated to discover and survey human beings' capability, limit, behavior and other futures.  And then apply it to the design of tools, facilities, systems, works and environments in order to enhance the quality of life and productivity.  The course includes research approaches, physical design, human being's feeling process and information process, human/machine interface, operating environments, and safety.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理實習。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course let the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解全面品質管理的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、品管工具，品管工具以外的管理工具、方法，實施全面品管遭遇到的問題，實施全面品質管理的預期成效。
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

description.zh: 就生產與服務系統做模擬分析，以輔助系統設計、改善、管理之決策。
description.en: Use simulation modeling for the resolution of complex system design, system improvement and management decision.

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開丙 10 人

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在學習物流管理的基本觀念與應用。課程內容包括：(1) 物流管理基本概念、(2) 物流系統設計、(3) 物流資訊科技、(4) 物流運輸作業、(5) 存貨管理、(6) 倉儲作業、(7) 配送作業、(8) 物流委外管理、(9) 全球物流管理、(10) 永續物流管理。
description.en: This course will introduce basic concept and application of logistics management. The topics addressed in this course include: (1) Basic concept and application of logistics management, (2) Logistics system and network design, (3) Logistics information technology, (4) Transportation management, (5) Inventory management, (6) Warehouse management, (7) Distribution management, (8) Logistics outsourcing management, (9) Global logistics management, (10) Sustainable logistics management.

notes: 工管四甲乙丙合開丙 20 人

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、殼類家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board,, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。 介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解木材機器加工原理及最新工業用木工機器之種類，並使學生熟悉家具製造技術，特別是製造家具需要用到的各種設備之加工能力，及其作業特性和刀具要件等方面之知識與實務。 介紹家具製造過程中所需之各種機器設備之種類及其加工性能。不論及機器本身之設計問題，而側重於機械之應用；不研究一種機器所能做出之各種巧妙的加工方法，而在討論量產作業時，如何利用最合適之機器及加工方法所應採用之標準操作方式。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering. The course is directed toward the efficient use of equipment in the production of large lots. In addition, the course does not concern itself with ingenious ways to do a maximum variety of operations on one machine; however, it is interested in presenting the best machine and method for standard production operations.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生了解木材塗裝專業知識與應用，主要包括：1. 木材塗料的種類。2. 木材塗裝方式的選擇，如何依照木材特性選用合適之塗裝方式。3. 塗裝作業方式，塗料乾燥、固化及硬化方法。4. 不同塗裝方式在木材外觀與維護上之影響。5. 塗膜缺陷與對策。
description.en: This course will help students to understand what is wood coating and application, include : 1. Wood coatings category.2. How to choose best way of wood coating process. 3. Coating process, curing, drying and hardening of paint. 4. The appearance and maintain in different finish. 5. Coating defects and solution.

description.zh: 本課程係提供學生有關家具的成本觀念，如何估算、分析和控制家具製品之成本。其講授內容有：成本結構、成本估算、材料成本、人工成本、製造費用、銷售費用、總成本及單位成本與產品報價等。
description.en: This course is to provide students with the concept of cost of furniture, how to estimate, analyze and control the cost of furniture products. Its teaching content includes: cost structure, cost estimation, material cost, labor cost, manufacturing cost, sales expense, total cost, unit cost and product quotation.

description.zh: 本課程之主旨為探討木質材料在生活產品上的設計應用，著重在傳統木工技藝、機械加工上的技能訓練，並培養學生在創新設計上的思維。更積極培養訓練學生以生活需求的觀點來創作木質材料產品，使學生能靈活運用各項木工基本機具設備製做各項木器產品。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to explore the design and application of wood materials in life products, focusing on traditional woodworking techniques, skills training on mechanical processing, and training students' thinking on innovative design. More active training and training students to create wooden materials from the perspective of living needs, so that students can use all kinds of woodworking basic machine equipment to make all kinds of wood products.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 實習操作車身矯正設備，肇事大、小變形車修理，車身校正，車身板件部份切換，以及封縫膠及防處理。
description.en: Students will practice the following subjects: Using body working equipment, Collision repair, Body alignment, Body panel replacement and sectioning, and Sealer, adhesive, and anti-rust treatment.

name.zh: 汽車板金及塗裝實習 (四)
name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Workshop (IV)

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車傳動系統及車身鈑噴實習，包含汽車車身及機車車架拆裝調整檢修，傳動系統元件拆裝調整檢修，車身測量，車身研磨、焊接及液壓施力設備之操作，金屬鈑金件之維修，車架及車身之校正及調整，門緣、車頭、玻璃及防潮條之更換，碰撞損壞之維修；塗裝及噴漆設備，塗裝及噴漆材料，配色技巧，車輛之塗裝及噴漆實際操作，完成品之品質檢驗。95 學年度前入學者適用下列實習內容：車輛電系和可程式控制器，包括：引擎電系，充電系檢測，點火系檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系檢測，電腦診斷系統檢測，其他電控系統檢測；可程式控制器系統規劃，可程式控制器之整合與評估，可程式控制器應用。
description.en: Automobile Drive Trains , Body Refinishing and Painting Service Shop Practice , Include the Repair, Overhaul and Trouble-Shooting of Automobile Transmission and Chassis, Automobile Body and Motorcycle Frame Assembly, Basic Dimensional Measurements, Inspection and Adjustments. The practice of automobile body sanding, welding and hydraulic straightening equipment; repairing of the sheet-metal panels; frame and body alignment; door trim, headlinings, glass and weatherstripping replacement; repairing of the collision damages ; Automobile refinishing and painting equipment, refinishing and painting materials , color matching, the practice of refinishing and painting of the vehicle , painting quality testing .For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , the practice contents are :Electrical and Electronic System, Battery, Starting System, Charging System, Ignition System, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System. Programmable logic controller (PLC) combi

description.zh: 柴油引擎 - 四行程柴油引擎、燃燒與燃燒室、燃料系統、預熱起動系統、電腦控制燃油噴射系統，汽車空調 - 冷氣基本作用原理、相關基礎熱力學、冷媒及冷凍油、汽車冷氣系統構造、汽車冷氣電路、汽車自動空調系統，汽車專業英文。
description.en: Diesel Engines include Four-Stroke Diesel engine, Combustion and combustion chamber, Fuel systems, Pre-Heat starting systems and Computer control fuel injection systems; Auto Air Condition Systems include Fundamental theory, Basic thermodynamics, Refrigerant and refrigerant oil, Construction, Electrical circuits and automatic air condition systems; Basic English for automotive service .

description.zh: 課程包含識圖與製圖，電腦輔助製圖，量具、畫線、切斷，彎曲，車身板金接縫與邊緣，車身材料，塗料組成、溶劑、稀釋液，塗料樹脂種類與乾燥、硬化原理，塗裝研磨材料，塗裝遮蔽用材料，拋光用研磨膏及保護臘，以及汽車塗裝美容用材料之介紹。
description.en: The course includes the following topics: Learning to read and make design drawings, Computer-aided drafting, Measurement systems, line drawing, and cutting, Bending, Body sheet metal seaming and hemming, Body materials, Paints, solvents, and thinners, Paint resin and curing, Paint abrasives, Masking materials, Polishing paste and protection wax, and Vehicle cosmetic materials.

name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Technology (II)

description.zh: 汽車材料的構成，金屬、非金屬、非鐵金屬、燒結合金及複合材料等在汽車分野上的應用，汽車材料的動向。
description.en: Compositions of Automotive Material，Applications of Metal、Nonmetal、Nonferrous Metal、Sintered Alloy、Composite materials for Automotive、Automotive Materia

description.zh: 先修課程：4402014 或負責教授同意柴油引擎概說，柴油之類別，特性與燃燒分析，柴油引擎與汽油引擎之比較，柴油引擎之類別與用途，柴油引擎之循環理論與工作分析，柴油引擎系統之主要構件、類別與特性分析，柴油引擎進排氣系統與環保控制裝置，柴油引擎之啟動設備，柴油引擎之其他配件與自動化，柴油引擎之特性數據與性能分析，柴油引擎之未來發展。
description.en: Diesel Engine Models, Combustion Analysis, Working Cycles Analysis, Major Components, Exhaust and Emission Control, Starting System, Performance Test and Analysis, Future Development.

description.zh: 底盤系統定期保養，輪胎平衡，四輪定位，變速箱分解檢查及故障排除。汽油及柴油引擎拆裝，引擎量測與調整，引擎啟動、點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之定期保養檢測及故障排除。
description.en: Experiments on vehicle chassis, and transmission. Inspection, adjustment and repair of chassis system, tire balance, wheel alignment, overhaul and trouble-shooting of transmission. Gasoline & diesel engine assembly, engine test, engine tune-up and repair, trouble-shooting and instrument adjustment on: ignition system, fuel system, cooling system, lubrication system, and starting system.

description.zh: 車身研磨、焊接及液壓施力設備之操作，金屬鈑金件之維修，車架及車身之校正及調整，門緣、車頭、玻璃及防潮條之更換，碰撞損壞之維修；塗裝及噴漆設備，塗裝及噴漆材料，配色技巧，車輛之塗裝及噴漆實際操作，完成品之品質檢驗。
description.en: The practice of automobile body sanding, welding and hydraulic straightening equipment; repairing of the sheet-metal panels; frame and body alignment; door trim, headlinings, glass and weatherstripping replacement; repairing of the collision damages ; Automobile refinishing and painting equipment, refinishing and painting materials , color matching, the practice of refinishing and painting of the vehicle , painting quality testing .

description.zh: 實習素色調色 (色相、明度、彩度)，珍珠銀粉色調色，三層珍珠色調色，小美容、以及全車大美容。
description.en: Students will practice the following subjects: Plain paint blending (including hue, lightness, and saturation), Pearl silver-color blending, Pearl color paint mixing, Vehicle salon, and Full vehicle spa.

name.zh: 汽車板金及塗裝實習 (五)
name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Workshop (V)

description.zh: 實習車身定位，車門、窗組件綜合檢修，汽車車體綜合檢修，以及汽車生產製造過程或維修服務實務參觀見學。
description.en: Students will practice the following subjects: Vehicle body positioning, Doors and windows comprehensive check and repair, Full vehicle body overhaul, and Tours to learn vehicle manufacturing process and service.

name.zh: 汽車板金及塗裝實習 (六)
name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Workshop (VI)

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生實務能力，學生利用整學期至各相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: This course, off-campus practice, aims to provide practical training for undergraduate students through working in enterprise environments. During one semester, students go to enterprises or organization related to energy, air-conditioning and refrigerating industries and learn application-oriented skills. After completing the course, the organization for internship will provide training certifications and evaluate the score of students. The intern should write internship report and send the report to department office.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 1. 能量基本原理 2. 石化燃料 3. 再生能源 4. 氫能源和燃料電池 5. 建築物的能源消耗 6. 核能 7. 節能 8. 交通 9. 能源使用和它與空氣污染的關係 10. 全球效應
description.en: 1. Energy fundamentals2. The fossil fuels3 Renewable energy sources4. Hydrogen Energy and Fuel Cell5. Energy consumption in buildings6. Nuclear energy7. Energy conservation8. Transportation9. Energy use and its relationship to air pollution10. Global effects.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹期貨、選擇權與相關衍生性金融商品的理論基礎與實務概念，了解衍生性金融商品在套利、避險與投機策略上的應用。課程內容包含期貨與選擇權兩個部分：在期貨議題方面，主要介紹期貨市場的組織結構、期貨契約的理論價格、以及避險策略；在選擇權議題方面，則是涵蓋選擇權市場的介紹、選擇權的理論價格、交易策略、與市場資訊分析。藉由對期貨與選擇權理論基礎的建構，期望能強化同學對於衍生性金融商品的實務應用能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to the theoretical and practical aspects of financial futures, options, and other derivatives. Derivatives have become one of the most important tools of modern finance, from both the academic and the practical standpoint. They are used for compensation, speculation, yield enhancements of investments, and, most importantly, for risk management. This course consists of two parts. The first part of the course deals with futures issues including the structure of futures markets, pricing of futures contracts, and hedging with such contracts. The second part of the course deals with options issues including options markets, strategies, pricing, and hedging analysis. Students will learn about the theoretical underpinnings and the practical applications in real world of derivative securities.

description.zh: 指導學生進行資訊與財金專題研究，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成資訊與財金相關專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work on Information and Financial Management and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

name.en: Special Projects on Information and Financial Management

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

notes: 科研 235 / 資財三甲乙合開

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分方程式之特殊解法，2. 傅立葉 (Fourier) 級數及轉換，3. 矩陣代數，4. 偏微分方程式，5. 數值方法，6. 複變函數。
description.en: 1.Special functions for solving ordinary differential   equetions2.Fourier seriesand transformation3.Matrix and linear algebra4.Partial differential equations5.Numerical methods6.Complex variables

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1. 頻率響應分析，2. 回授放大器，3. 電路之穩定性分析，4. 運算放大器，5. 波形之合成與整形電路，6. 濾波器，7. 功率放大器。
description.en: 1.Frequency response 2.Feedback amplifier 3.Stability analysis 4.Operational amplifier 5.Waveform generators and shaping 6.Filter 7.Power amplifier

description.zh: 內容包含： (1) 串級放大電路；(2) 場效電晶體之特性；(3) 場效電晶體放大電路；(4) 運算放大器應用電路 (反相放大器、非反相放大器、加法器、減法器、對數放大器、積分器、微分器、比較器); (5) 基本振盪電路 (RC 振盪電路、韋恩電橋振盪電路、石英晶體振盪電路、無穩態多諧振盪電路、單穩態多諧振盪電路、雙穩態多諧振盪電路、施密特觸發器、方波產生電路、三角波產生電路); (6) 高頻電路、低頻電路之嚮應；(7) 回授放大器；(8) 放大器之穩定性實驗；(9) 振盪器設計；(10) 主動濾波器；(11) 功率電路。
description.en: 1.Response of low-frequency circuits 2.Response of high-frequency circuits 3.Feedback amplifier 4.Stability of amplifier 5.Design of oscillator 6.Operational amplifier 7.Active filter 8.Power amplifier circuit

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習 18 週，每週不得低於 2.5 天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 修完「學院指定向度課程」12 學分後，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: After completing 12 credits “designated by the college”, the remaining 6 credits are open for selection form these curriculums: humanities and art, social and legal, nature and science and innovation and entrepreneurship, until a total of 18 credits of the general curriculum are completed for graduation.

description.zh: 修完「學院指定向度課程」12 學分後，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: After completing 12 credits “designated by the college”, the remaining 6 credits are open for selection form these curriculums: humanities and art, social and legal, nature and science and innovation and entrepreneurship, until a total of 18 credits of the general curriculum are completed for graduation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train the students who can be familiar with the statistics approaches and theories. Besides, they will be able to employ the collected data to analyze the unknown environments. The course includes probability theory, testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train the students who can be familiar with the statistics approaches and theories. Besides, they will be able to employ the collected data to analyze the unknown environments. The course includes probability theory, testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、等候原理、存貨模式、專案管理、模擬等。
description.en: In this course, the basic concepts and applications of Nonlinear Programming Models in Operations Research. It includes Integer Programming、Dynamic Programming、Game Theory、Markovian Chains、Queueing Theory、Inventory Theory、Project Management and Simulation Modeling﹒

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems.  The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

description.zh: 本課程藉由家具相關設計競賽活動或產學合作計畫案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
description.en: The course through furniture design contest or industry-academy cooperation project, let students practice the design procedure and creative methods. The course coordinate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, computer aided furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of creativity design and product engineering.

description.zh: 包括工業發展概況、工廠組織、工廠計劃與佈置、製造工程、工作研究、生產管制、物料管理、品質管制、成本管制、人事管理、工業安全與衛生。
description.en: General Situation of Industrial Developments, Factory Organization, Factory Plan and Layout, Manufacture Engineering, Work Study, Product Control, Materials Control, Quality Control, Cost Control, Personnel Management, Industrial Safety and Hygiene.

description.zh: 探討家具成本之構成要素：原料、人力、製造及銷管費用等項目。介紹損益平衡之計算分析並控制家具之製作成本，此外也將論及工程經 濟之分析以便對於各種製造資源能有較佳之決策。
description.en: This course will acquaint the student with the techniques of pricing a piece of furniture including materials, label, overhead, and administrative express. To calculate "break-even" points, to analyze and control cost elements of furniture manufacturing, with special emphasis of economic utilization of materials, manpower and machines.

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communicate skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 應用試作技術課程之試作技術，進行家具相關設計圖面實體模型之材料加工、組裝實作。
description.en: To practice product model making techniques. Based on furniture product working drawing, design students can practice model making techniques with different materials and processing methods.

notes: 設計館地下 1 樓 B02 木工廠

description.zh: 本課程由 ERP 概論談起，介紹完整的 ERP 架構及涵蓋的模組，以及企業規劃及導入 ERP 的過程，最後結合案例介紹、並探討從 ERP 到企業的 e 化等主題，期許同學完成本課程後能了解並運用 ERP。
description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

description.zh: 藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活困難，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
description.en: This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.

name.zh: 跨域全齡商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Product Design for All Ages

notes: 日職合開，USR，設計館 207 教室

description.zh: 介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所 涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、 廣告促銷以及行銷計畫等。
description.en: An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, adverising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.

notes: 設計館地下 1 樓 B01 教室

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 線性電路 3. 運算放大器 4. 二極體 5. 非線性電路應用 6. 接面場效電晶體 (JFET) 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 (MOSFET) 8. 雙極性接面電晶體 (BJT)
description.en: This course is to study the characteristics of the semiconductor devices and design of the electronic circuits. This course will contain as following subjects:1.Basic Concepts.  2.Linear Circuits.  3.Differential and Multistage Amplifiers.  4.The pn Junction Diode  5.Non-linear Circuits.  6.Field-Effect Transistors (FETs)  7.MOS Digital Circuits  8.Bipolar Digital Circuits

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組，凸輪，齒輪，純滾動系統，鏈輪，皮帶，滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Introduction of the principles which all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members． Examples include linkages, Cams, Gears, Pure rolling system, Chain drives, Belt drives, Friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：4403053 或負責教授同意本徵值與本徵函數，向量分析，向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程，複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

description.zh: 先修課程：4402014 或負責教授同意燃料及燃燒，基本熱傳理論，蒸汽動力廠，壓縮機，燃氣輪機，內燃機，汽油引擎，柴油引擎，冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

description.zh: 本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
description.en: Introduction to flow phenomena of incompressible flow, discussion on the dimensionless groups and their applicants, derive the conservation equations such as the Bernoulli equation, using fluid mechanics to analyze the field and the dynamics of fluid machinery, pipe and duct flow are also discuss.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生實務能力，學生利用整學期至各相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: This course, off-campus practice, aims to provide practical training for undergraduate students through working in enterprise environments. During one semester, students go to enterprises or organization related to energy, air-conditioning and refrigerating industries and learn application-oriented skills. After completing the course, the organization for internship will provide training certifications and evaluate the score of students. The intern should write internship report and send the report to department office.

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1) 磁路分析 (2) 電機 - 機械能量轉換 (3) 繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4) 繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5) 繞組因數 (6) 直流機 (7) 感應機 (8) 同步機。
description.en: Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators, synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：CMEE：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.EECS：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.CHASS：4 credits for t

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 人文與藝術
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Humanities and Art

description.zh: 修完「學院指定向度課程」12 學分後，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: After completing 12 credits “designated by the college”, the remaining 6 credits are open for selection form these curriculums: humanities and art, social and legal, nature and science and innovation and entrepreneurship, until a total of 18 credits of the general curriculum are completed for graduation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train the students who can be familiar with the statistics approaches and theories. Besides, they will be able to employ the collected data to analyze the unknown environments. The course includes probability theory, testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程介紹國際金融市場以及金融系統。本課程涵蓋範圍包含：股票市場、貨幣市場、債券市場、外匯市場、房貸市場、投資銀行、保險產業、基金市場… 等。主要目的在讓學生了解整個金融市場是如何運作。同時以個案討論方式讓學生對整體的金融市場與機構有通盤的了解。
description.en: This course introduces the international financial markets (i.e. money market, bond market, stock market, mortgage market, foreign exchange market, investment banks, commercial banks…etc). The objectives of this course are to develop a fundamental understanding of (i) how financial markets work; (ii) how financial systems affect people and daily life.

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前財務金融之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的財金模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其財務管理、金融市場與機構、風險管理及公司治理之實務決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的財務金融專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current financial market, through the financial simulation laboratory, students build their decision-making ability of financial management, financial market and institutions, risk management and corporate governance. Further training students to obtain international and domestic financial professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 值此一網際網路和數位經濟時代，資料通訊與網路已經顯著影響企業經營、管理及決策與策略規劃同時也影響人們之生活及活動。 它的應用非常廣泛、無所不在且多元。 商業公司及企業可以運用資料通訊及網路化資訊系統來提升競爭優勢及執行績效、經營者決策及客戶服務效率與全球化商務、產品及服務。資料通訊可以在各種設置上以有線及無線的方式使用。因此，本課程的開課目標旨在學習並瞭解資料通訊及網路之基本原理、基礎建設、技術、管理及企業應用等之議題。本課程主要探討之主題包括 1) 資料通訊基本原理、2) 資料傳輸技術、3) 網路應用、4) 有線及無線區域網路、5) 有線及無線廣域網路、6) 網際網路與 TCP/IP、7) 網路安全、8) 網路設計、9) 網路管理、10) 分散資料處理、 11) 主從、內部網路與雲端運算、12) 第四代行動網路和往後世代等。
description.en: In this era of Internet economy, businesses and enterprises may leverage data communications (DC) and networked information systems to enhance competitive advantages, streamline managerial decision making, and customer services. DC may be adopted in a variety of devices on both wire and wireless modes. Consequently, the objectives of this course aim to study the issues of fundamentals, infrastructure, technologies, management and business applications on data communications and networks. The major topics of this course contains 1) Fundamentals of DC, 2) Technologies of data transmission, 3) Network applications, 4) Wired and wireless local area networks, 5) Wired and wireless wide area networks, 6) The Internet and TCP/IP, 7) Network security, 8) Design networks, 9) Network administration; 10) Distributed data processing, 11) Client/Server, Intranet, and cloud computing, 12) Fourth generation (4G) Mobile networks and onwards.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 1.Core 的特性分析 2.Choke 設計 3. 高頻變壓器設計 4.Core 的特性實習 5.Choke 實習 6. 高頻變壓器實習
description.en: 1.Analysis of core2.Design of choke3.High frequency transformer design4.Practice of core,choke and high frequency transformer

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構，能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在 Hadoop 生態系統中，以 Cloudera Hadoop 為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop 硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹 Hadoop 認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

notes: 請幫忙安排二教 103 教室 / 職電機所 / 創新 AI 電資 AI 合開

description.zh: 瞭解 CMOS 超大型積體電路之電路元件特性及其組合電路之分析與設計方法，其內容包含：金氧半電晶體電路特性分析、電路性能評估、電路模擬、組合電路設計、序向電路設計、設計方法分析、測試與驗證、CMOS 案例討論與 Verilog HDL 設計等課程內容。
description.en: This course covers the electric specification, circuit analyses, and design methods of the CMOS VLSI. The contents of this course include: Circuit characterization, performance estimation, Circuit simulation, Combinational circuit, Sequential circuit, Design methodology, Testing and verification, CMOS case study, and Verilog HDL design.

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統 2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1. 能源成本控制    2. 區域型電力能管理策略    3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: (1) 物聯網概述，(2) 物聯網感知層，(3) 物聯網網路層，(4) 物聯網應用層，(5) 物聯網平台與雲端運算，(6) 無線感測網路 802.15.4 與 ZigBee，(7) 無線感測網路應用，(8) RFID 原理與應用，(9) WSNs 至 IoT，(10) 近期發展與研究議題。
description.en: (1) Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT), (2) IoT: Perception Layer, (3) IoT: Network Layer, (4) IoT: Application Layer, (5) IoT Platform and Could Computing, (6) Wireless Sensor Networks (WSNs): 802.15.4 and ZigBee, (7) WSN Applications, (8) Principles and Applications of RFID, (9) WSNs to IoT, (10) Recent Advances and Related Research Issues.

name.en: Internet of Things and Sensor Networks

description.zh: 1. 解析法 2. 變分法 3. 動差法 4. 有限元素法 5. 譜域分析法 6. 傳輸線矩陣法
description.en: 1.Analytical Method 2.Variational Method 3.Moment Method 4.Finite 5.Spectral Domain Analysis 6.Transmission Line Matrix

description.zh: 1. 網路協定、2. 消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準、3. 錯誤更正碼：迴旋碼渦輪碼低密度同位檢查碼 BCH/RS 碼、4. 無線視訊傳輸的抗錯、5. 跨層資源分配、6. 無線區域網路、7. 隨意網路和感測網路、8. 無線個人 / 大都會 / 體域 / 網狀網路、9. 物聯網等最新發展
description.en: 1. Network protocols 2. Information theory, source coding and Video standards 3. channel coding: convolutional codes/turbo codes/LDPC codes/BCH/RS codes 4. Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線理論 2. 等量傳輸網路之合成 3. 集體元件微波電路 4. 半集總濾波電路之合成 5. 耦合傳輸線之物理參數 6. 耦合傳輸線濾波器 7. 指狀濾波器 8. 梳型濾波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line theory2.Synthesis of commensurate line networks3.Lumped element microwave circuits4.Synthesis of semi-lumped filter curcuits5.Physical parameters of coupled lines6.Coupled lines filter7.Interdigital filter8.Combline filter

description.zh: 本課程包含：1. 散射參數與網路分析儀 2. 頻譜儀介紹 3. 自動化量測 4. 平面化傳輸線 5. 射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配 6. 積體電路封裝 7. 射頻耦合器 8. 射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路，進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 電源管理 IC 設計簡介 2. 電壓參考電路設計 3. 低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4. 交換式電壓調整器 5. 交換電容電源轉換器 6. 電池充電技術與應用 7. 設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 1. 固體結晶結構 2. 能隙與載子 3. 載子傳輸 4. 過量載子 5. P-N 接面 6. 金半接面及半導體異質接面 7. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 8. 雙極電晶體
description.en: 1. Crystal Structure of Solids2. Energy Bands and Charge Carriers3. Carrier Transport4. Excess Carriers5. P-N Junctions6. Metal-Semiconductor and Semiconductor Heterojunstions7. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor Field Effect Transistor (MOSFET)8. Bipolar Transistor

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：原理探討：超音波，磁場與磁性，電磁感應與渦電流，輻射線，液體表面現象，材料微結構；方法介紹：磁場檢測法，超音波檢測法，渦電流檢測法，X 光檢測法，液滲法，微奈米檢測 (各種顯微鏡) 等；材料非破壞檢測實驗：導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
description.en: Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

name.zh: 材料與結構非破壞檢測
name.en: Non-Destructive Testing of Materials and Structures

notes: (日職合開) 日間限 7 人，夜間限 7 人

description.zh: 碩士學位論文.
description.en: Thesis for master degree's partially requirement.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與土木有關之法規，諸如建築法、建築技術規則、都市計劃法、採購法、環保法規、水利法等，併借相關案例之分析研究，訓練學生土木法規之知識與能力。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on code of building , rule of construction technology ,stock up code ,code of environmental protection etc.

name.en: Legal Affairs and Dispute resolution in Construction

description.zh: 基礎工程施工期間，由於破壞原有的平衡，經常造成土壤或結構物的沈陷，傾斜，龜裂及破壞等，本課程介紹如何藉由監測的量測值，來分析評估基礎工程的安全性，同時也可配合非破壞性檢測的方法，來評估結構或土壤的力學性質，再進而評估安全性。
description.en: This course introduces how to analyze and evaluate the safety of foundation engineering through the measured values of monitoring. Also, it can also cooperate with non-destructive testing methods to evaluate the mechanical properties of structures or soils, and then evaluate the safety.

name.zh: 基礎工程監測及檢測評估
name.en: In-situ Testing and Monitoring in Foundation Engineering

description.zh: 本課程將以 BIM 之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討 BIM 之設計與實作，希望學生能夠經由防救災或工程管理之需求分析開始，瞭解 BIM 建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而設計一個 BIM 在防救災與管理之實務應用，其內容包括：BIM 自動化防救災應用，BIM 實務應用，國內外 BIM 案例探討，BIM 應用之分析與設計，BIM 系統設計與開發，BIM 系統在防救災與工程管理之應用等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for applications disaster prevention and management recently. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, development, and related applications for disaster prevention and engineering management. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments, a midterm report and a final project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related applications suitable to their own researches to meet disaster prevention or engineering management requirement.

name.zh: 建築資訊模型與防救災及工程管理
name.en: Applications of Building Information Modeling for Disaster Prevention and Engineering Management

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 碩士論文寫作
description.en: A Student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 介紹各種產能反應的原子分子層級理論，包括燃燒、氫生成反應、氧還原反應、二氧化碳還原反應，和電化學電池、燃料電池，新能源材料等物理化學反應程序，以及低碳應用。
description.en: This course introduces reactions of energy production in the insight of atomic and molecular scale, including combustion, hydrogen evolution reaction, oxygen reduction reaction, carbon dioxide reduction reaction, and physiochemical mechanisms of electrochemical cells, fuel cells, new energy materials, and low-carbon applications.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一) 儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二) 儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 中文概述：碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生提出應用科技領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion/implications underlying major research in applied technology through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 本課程在探究技職教育的本質、目標、歷史發展及相關哲學思潮，期培養學生發展批判思考能力分析技職教育相關議題。
description.en: This course is designed to investigate the purpose, essence, history,    and related philosophical thinking of Vocational and Technological Technical Education (VTE)；to develop students forming critical thinking to analyze the current issues in VTE.

name.en: Philosophy of Technological and Vocational Education

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: （一）瞭解生涯規劃與經營的理論及實務；（二）探討生涯規劃與經營模式；（三）應用生涯規劃與經營模式。課程內容包括：生涯規劃與生涯管理的定義、內涵與功能、生涯探究指引、生涯目標設定、生涯策略、生涯評估、生涯管理議題、人力資源支持系統及組織生涯管理系統。
description.en: The course arms to (1) Understand the theory and application Of career planning and management. (2) Explore the model of career planning and management. (3) Apply the career planning and management model. It covers the definition, essence, and function of career planning and management, a guide to career exploration, career goal setting, career strategies, career appraisal, and contemporary issues in career management, human resource support system, and organizational career management system.

name.en: Career Planning and Management for Employees

description.zh: 本課程將教授現行的科技教學工具如電子白板、按按按、電子書包等設計的學理基礎以及應用於教學中的特性及趨勢，並進一步講述如何融入於教學及學習。
description.en: The course is designed to explore how to apply technological tools effectively in the classroom. Concepts and strategies will be covered.

name.en: The use of technology in teaching and learning

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

notes: 日夜合開，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 探討數位學習方法與策略。內容包括情境學習、建構學習、合作學習、社會學習、自律學習、自我導向學習、專題學習、問題導向學習等。
description.en: To explore e-learning methods and strategies including situated learning, constructivist learning, cooperative learning, socil learning, self-regulated learning, self-directed learning, project-based learning, problem-based learning etc...

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the vocational education related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 碩二，, 計中電腦教室

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 班級經營

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目，在教授個別指導下，進行實驗之研究，以培養學生尋找相關資料，文獻及獨立研究的訓練，並將其研究成果撰寫成碩士論文。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study in master level.  Students will be assigned a research topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final master thesis are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎 (a) 輸送現象 (b) 高分子黏彈學 (c) 高分子混煉。(II) 高分子加工學之應用 (a) 壓模法 (b) 沖模法 (c) 反應沖模法 (d) 絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA 結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及 DNA 複製及轉錄和 RNA 轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR 和 DNA 重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray 等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有 (1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論 (2) 界面的作用力 (3) 表面及界面的熱力學 (4) 液體和固體界面的熱力學 (5) 表面及界面張力的測量 (6) 接觸角的測量 (7) 吸附的熱力學 (8) 分散液的穩定性 (9) 分散液分子間吸力及斥力 (10) 懸浮液之高分子穩定性 (11) 凝聚 (12) 界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 課程從統計模式 (迴歸分析)、概率、再進入隨遇變數、概率分佈、分佈曲線種類、樣品分佈、統計評估及統計測試等核心。
description.en: The contents of this course are statistical modeling (regression analysis)、probability, random variables and probability distributions, important probability distribution in engineering, sampling  distributions, statistical estimation and statistical testing.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於建築與都市設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into architecture and urban design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

description.zh: 本課程以都市再生理念為中心，講述推動都市再生過程中面對相關文化資產保存議題之理論與實際操作架構。第一部份探討歷史文化保存相關理念手法。第二部份探討各國文化保存再生案例實踐之相關課題與借鏡，第三部份針對台灣本土都市更新過程中面臨歷史文化保存議題深入研討。
description.en: This course regards urban revitalization as the central concept to discuss about the theory & implementation of history & culture conservation issues of urban revitalization. This course consisted of three parts. The first part is considered of relevant concepts & strategies of history and culture conservation. The second part is to survey different implemented examples of history and culture conservation of different country. The third part involves the regional issues by local-oriented issues of Taiwan. A few of cultural conservation topics are introduced to be further interpreted.

name.en: Special topics on urban & culture revitalization

description.zh: 本課程旨在瞭解世界地域文化中，因人、因時、因地制宜的建築生產過程，及其涉入空間行為因時間積累而呈現的特殊環境型態、類型與結構；即在探討地方自然地理環境，如何經由人類行為的涉入，呈現出富鄉土涵構的人文景觀。
description.en: This course is to understand the relations between human, behavior, material and the environment of architecture in the world. And try to introduce the vernacular characters of the World architecture by the discussion of some special architectural themes.

description.zh: 資訊蒐集技術是研究生在從事研究工作與論文寫作時必須具備的工具。本課程主要目的在協助研究生在眾多的資訊來源中，如何搜尋正確及高品質的資訊。課程內容涵蓋資訊蒐集技術的原則及應用，並探討多種的實用工具及電子資訊來源，以滿足研究生在作研究及論文寫作上對資訊的需求。
description.en: Information gathering skills are essential to the studying of graduate students and the development of their subject knowledge on dissertation/thesis writing. The course is designed to help graduate students to find the right kind and the right quality of information from the vast amount available.  The content of the course will deal with the broad principles and practices underlying information gathering techniques which explore the many practical tools and electronics sources of information that will help graduate students find the information they need when doing research or writing the dissertation/thesis.

notes: 由廖硃岑老師及蔡淑瑩老師共同授課

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第二階段之系列課程，其內容包括：一.疫學：探討關於病態建築症候群的因素與特定外來的致病物質與疫之關聯。二。家政事務：探討生活習慣、飲食生活的變化對環境、人體健康之影響。三。醫療領域：探討病態建築症候群與化學物質過敏症的差異與因應對策。四。日常領域：探討日常生活用品、居住行為對環境、人體健康之影響。
