The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

notes: 桃分署上課；場地因素，該班僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 窗型空調、箱型空調、中央空調、除濕空調、及各型空調實習、運輸空調實習、各種空調過程實驗及空氣性質點之測定、空調熱回收裝置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of room air conditioner, package air conditioner, central air conditioning system, dehumidifying air conditioning system, etc. To provide students with abilities of experiment of air conditioning processes and measurement of air properties.

description.zh: 各種壓縮機起動控制、順序控制、溫度控制、濕度控制、水流量控制、外氣控制、焓值控制、氣壓控制、電動控制、電子控制等實習。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of compressor control, sequence control, temperature control, humidity control, flow control, outdoor air control, enthalpy control, and pneumatic control, electric control, electronic control on HVAC systems.

description.zh: 本課程實習內容主要包含冷凍空調節能技術；動態節能模擬分析；無塵室節能技術；潔淨能源 (諸如太陽能、風能、燃料電池等) 技術。
description.en: This practice course mainly contains: energy-saving technology in refrigeration and air conditioning, dynamic energy simulation, energy-saving technology in cleanrooms and clean energy (such as solar energy, wind energy, and fuel cell, etc).

description.zh: 以套裝軟體學習電腦輔助繪圖，及如何將此技術應用於冷凍空調領域。
description.en: Computer Aided Drawing For HVAC & R Engineering by using package software.

description.zh: 本課程講授工業電子相關之原理，包含：1. 基本元件簡介、2. 電晶體開關裝置及其應用、 3. 電子元件及其應用、 4. SCR 與 TRIAC、 5. 感測器原理與應用。本課程並包含下列實習單元：R-L-C 元件，諧振電路，濾波電路與變壓器，零件運用與電路檢修，感測器應用。
description.en: This course provides design-oriented approach to the understanding of electronic devices, circuits, and system used in industry. Both lectures and laboratory exercises are provided.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電磁之基本原理及定律，並講解各種電機、變壓器之特性、理論、及控制方法，透過實習課程使同學明瞭機器驅動所用之動力其電功與機械功之轉換原理與控制進而可自行操作及維護。
description.en: An introduction of the basic principles of the electro-magnetic theories. Topics include the characteristics, theories and control algorithms of the various electrical equipment and transformers.

description.zh: 商用冷凍系統電路元件介紹、商用冷凍冷藏設備電路裝配、冷媒管路系統裝配、故障判斷及排除。
description.en: Introduction of electric circuits of commercial refrigeration systems, electric circuit of commercial refrigeration facilities, installation of refrigerant piping system and trouble shooting.

description.zh: 箱型空調機電路裝配、冷卻水管路施工安裝、冷媒管路系統裝配、故障判斷及排除、冷媒更換。恆溫恆濕空調系統控制電路配線、中央空調系統試陣調整、水量與風量平衡調整、TAB 操作。
description.en: Electric circuit of air handler, installation of coolant piping, installation of coolant pipe system, trouble shooting, refrigerant replacement, constant electric circuit of air-conditioner control for constant temperature and humidity, test and balance of central units, test and balance of water and air flow.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程「國語文實務應用」，專為本校科技大學的同學而設計，以未來於職場（生存）與人生（生活、生命）之實務應用為教學標的。     奠基於大學之前 12 年的國語文能力上，課程設計朝向多元實務應用的方向，以建構學生多元溝通表達之職場需求力為要，包括資訊蒐集力、資訊應用力、簡報製作力、文案企劃力、自我宣傳力、口語溝通力、採訪寫作力、理念論述力、創新思維力等諸多領域的能力，並重視啟發學生培養生活品味力，深化學生對於生命關懷力的體認，以契合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統，以及學生未來畢業後的實務需求。
description.en: This course, "Practical Application of Chinese Language", is designed for the students of the University of Science and Technology. It is based on the practical application in the future work and life. Based on the Chinese language ability of the previous 12 years before the university, the curriculum design is oriented towards the application of multiple practices, with the construction of students diverse communication and expression in needs of the  future work as the main, including information gathering ability, information application ability, presentation production ability, writing ability , self-promotion, oral communication, interview writing, idea exposition, innovative thinking, and many other areas, and attaches great importance to inspiring students to cultivate their taste in life, deepening students' understanding of practical use of Chinese in the future.

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：College of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 社會與法治
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Social and Rules of Law

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: NA

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 自然與科學
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Nature and Science

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 介紹程式語言設計的基本概念，包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。並加強實務程式製作。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 學習經濟理論的基本觀念，涵蓋個體與總體經濟學相關議題，包括市場如何運作，市場與福利，公共部門經濟學，廠商行為與產業組織，勞動市場經濟學，總體經濟學資料，長期實質經濟，長期貨幣與物價，開放體系的總體經濟學，短期經濟波動等主題。
description.en: This course provides the basic concept of economic theory, including microeconomics and macroeconomics. The topics are as follows: how markets work, markets and welfare, the economics of the public sector, firm behavior and the organization of industry, the economics of the labor market, the data of macroeconomics, the real economy in the long run, money and prices in the long run, the macroeconomics of open economics, and short-run economic fluctuations.

notes: 科研 240 / 資財一甲乙合開

description.zh: 本課程可使學生瞭解：貨幣與資金市場、投資問題、如何取得資金與運用資金、使公司價值最大、使股東權益最大化、瞭解代理制度、瞭解公司股票、債務之利用，股利政策等事項。
description.en: This course has provided: money and capital market、Investments 、How to obtaining and using funds、Maximize the value o their firms、How to maximize stockholders' stock、To know agency problem 、To know the price of the firm's stock, use of debt and dividend policy.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程將針對英語授課 (English as a medium of instruction, EMI) 及學科與語言整合教學 (Content and Language Integrated Learning , CLIL) 兩大領域範疇進行深入探究，本課程將探討不同主題包含：EMI/CLIL 不同的理論架構、EMI/CLIL 於不同學科上之應用、以及 EMI/CLIL 於不同教育階段的應用等主題，並透過課堂討論、小組活動、個案研究以及專題提案討論，提升學生對相關主題的知識建構與教學能力，建立其對 EMI/CLIL 主題於文獻探討之掌握及相關研究方法，並期將所學之知能應用在課堂教學中。
description.en: This course in an introductory course for English as a Medium of Instruction (EMI) and Content and Language Integrated Learning (CLIL). This course aims to cultivate students’ knowledge about EMI and CLIL and their applications in different disciplines across different educational levels. The elements of teaching subject areas in English will be discussed in class to equip students with the basic concepts and techniques for EMI and CLIL. Through various class activities such as lectures, discussions, case studies, group work, and larger projects, students will explore not only the theorical foundations for EMI and CLIL but also classroom pedagogy and methodological approaches related to EMI and CLIL. The promises and challenges of EMI and CLIL and emerging issues will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: Stories of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

name.zh: 英文傳奇故事：電影動漫及遊戲
name.en: Legends in Movies: Anime and Games

description.zh: 本課程深入探討吸附與離子交換的基本原理及相關理論分析，進而了解如何設計改進相關之分離技術。內容包括吸附原理、吸附之數學模式、吸附分離技術之應用、離子交換原理、離子交換之數學模式、離子交換分離技術之應用。
description.en: This course will cover the analysis of principle and theory of adsorption and ion exchange. This course contains principle, mathematical model and application of adsorption and ion exchange in separation technology.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹語言測驗和評量的基本概念和原則。本課程將討論語言測驗和評量相關的基本理論概念、並將探討如何在實踐中應用這些理論概念。本課程結束前，學生將能夠將這些原則應用於評估學習者的表現、並設計評量來適切對應學習者需求。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the basic concepts and principles of language testing and assessment. Fundamental theoretical concepts related to language testing and assessment will be discussed before the class moves on to how these theoretical concepts can be applied in practice. By the end of this course, students would be able to apply these principles in the evaluation of their students’ performances and in the design of assessments which will appropriately address the needs of their learners.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研討專業英文研究及應用，課程包括專業領域英語文之語域分析，探討各領域中的語法及詞彙特點，並進一步分析不同領域中之修辭及言語萹章使用，進而研討語言溝通目標功能分析並結合策略研究，以將理論應用於專業實務及研究中。
description.en: This course is intended for graduate students who are pre-experienced in working in specific fields of professions. For other students who are inexperienced in the workplace are required to have consolidated knowledge and observations of the world industries. It aims to address the applicability of theories in EPP and the plethora of situations raised from such applications. The course will provide theoretical studies for applications in respect to register analysis, rhetorical and discourse analysis, functionality analysis and skills and strategies. It is also expected that the course will describe other models in EPP studies.

name.en: Theories and Practice in English for Professional Purposes

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

notes: 碩二必修 (畢業前須修滿兩門論文)

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

notes: 碩二生於二上 & 下學期皆需選此課

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程適合所有對於如何向自然取經的創新設計策略有興趣的學生。學生將探索這個將功能、性能和美學從生物學轉換成科技的過程，及如何增進設計創造力和產生比傳統技術更好的解決方案，包括講授從原始科學突破到創業初創企業的仿生設計過程，從壁虎式粘合劑到可跑步、飛行和游泳的機器人等案例分析，以及跨領域學生團隊合作進行原創的生物啟發設計專題。
description.en: Bioinspired design views the process of how we learn from Nature as an innovation strategy translating principles of function, performance and aesthetics from biology to human technology. This course gives an overview of how bioinspired design can lead to more design creativity and to better solutions than with conventional technology. Lectures will address the biomimicry design process from original scientific breakthroughs to entrepreneurial start-ups using cases studies that include gecko-inspired adhesives and robots that run, fly and swim, Interdisciplinary teams of students will collaborate on, create, and present original bioinspired design projects.

description.zh: 探討趨勢研究之理論與實務，其中包括：生活形態、流行及科技發展之趨勢。研究主題尚包括地域與文化所造成的趨勢差異、趨勢對產品設計之影響及趨勢之應用研究等。
description.en: Current theories and practices of trend study are covered, including trends of living style, fashion and technology development. Topics covered include: regional and cultural difference in trends, influences of trends in product design and application study of trends.

notes: 日職合開；設計 603；上限 7 人

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communicate skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 專利文件是最具價值的技術研發資訊。課程除了介紹專利相關基礎知識之外，並以有效的專利檢索分析技藝洞悉未來技術趨勢，特別是針對化學工程、生物科技、生醫材料、智能程序工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米材料等系所研究發展領域的專利文件。透過有系統的分析及視覺化的圖示呈現企業有用的專利情報 (intelligence)，並找到其中潛在的商業利益。
description.en: Patent documents are the most valuable technology research and development information. In addition to introducing the basic knowledge of patents, the course also uses effective patent retrieval and analysis techniques to gain insight into future technological trends. The technical fields of patent documents are especially aimed at chemical engineering, biotechnology, biomedical materials, chemical process and intelligent engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductors and nanomaterials. Present the useful patent intelligence of enterprises through systematic analysis and visual diagrams, and try to find the potential commercial benefits.

name.zh: 化工類專利分析與策略運用
name.en: Analysis and strategic application of chemical engineering patents

description.zh: 本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包括 NC 基本概念，一般機械零件之 NC 與 APT 程式製作，複雜曲面零件之 NC 程式製作，CAM 系統實習，群組技術電腦輔助製程規劃，電腦輔助製程規劃系統實習，電腦輔助生產規劃。
description.en: This course has been prepared for the comprehensive of Computer-aided manufacturing, with emphasis on the essentials of CNC technology and programming. Through the projects practice, the students are able to adapt to the techniques of CAM.

description.zh: 1. 基本觀念，2.RC 主動網路之元件與子網路，3. 具有零元件及任意元件的主動網路分析，4. 雙極接面電晶體之線性應用，5. 運算放大器之線性應用，6. 網路靈敏度，7. 分解，結構，及靈敏度，8. 二階濾波電路之合成與設計，9. 梯形濾波電路之合成與設計，10. 信號流程圖之濾波電路之合成與設計
description.en: 1.Fundamental Concepts, 2.Elements and Sub-networks of RC-Active Networks, 3.Analysis of Active Networks using Nullors, 4.The Bipolar-Junction Transistor and Linear Applications, 5.The Operational Amplifier and Linear Circuit Applications, 6.Network Sensitivity, 7.Decomposition, Structures, and Sensitivity,8.Biquadratic Filter Synthesis and Design, 9.Ladder Filter Synthesis and Design, 10.Filter Design using Signal-Flow Graph Simulation

name.zh: RC 主動電路之分析與設計
name.en: Analysis and Design of RC-Active Circuits

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源 (如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源 (如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等) 及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 本課程介紹統計學、計量經濟學之基本概念，旨在培養學生理解數據、進而分析數據能力。課程理論與實務並重，採理論講授、上機實作交替方式進行，確保學生在實務上應用統計理論之能力。透過修習本課程，學生可將統計概念應用於自然科學領域之實驗數據整理，或社會科學領域之巨量資料分析，培養具備跨領域問題分析能力之學生。
description.en: This course aims to develop the ability to understand and analyze environmental problems through the basic concept of statistics and econometrics. Both lectures regarding theories and practical lessons on computer are included in this course to make sure students’ ability of application in the future. Skills taught in this course can be applied in both natural science and social science, thus enhancing students’ interdisciplinary potential.

description.zh: 有鑒於國內的教育制度主張男女擁有平等的權利，但實際結果卻是女學生在理工科系方面成為少數族群，本課程以增進女性參與人機互動為主要目標，結合一連串的研習營教學與展示技術的引入，教導有關互動科技技術等相關應用，並透過了解性別研究的主要流派與其理論，來確認性別研究與互動設計的性質與功能，期待學生能再了解性別研究的主要理論後，能把它應用於互動設計以及創意發想上，以因應未來女性經濟力的快速掘起。
description.en: The education system of Taiwan claims that men and women are equal. The truth is that female students are only a minority of the department of the science and engineering, not to mention the percentage of the further education in this field. Based on this concept, we plan the interactive curriculum. We will go to give instruction about the interactive technology. In order to test the spot reaction and track the reaction after the exhibition when the exhibition is ongoing, we will apply Radio-frequency identification. The outdoor education and the indoor education; the two complement each other and expecting this exhibition to encourage more female students to discovery the science and have better achievements in this field.

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的理論、企劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告專案製作之掌握、發揮互動式媒體特性的方法，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程透過課堂中關於互動式廣告原理的講授、相關的個案研究以及文獻導讀使學生能具備互動式廣告之企劃與研究分析能力。學生評量方式包含報告繳交以及分組討論與發表。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory, planning and techniques of interactive advertisement, which includes the characteristics of interactive media, project management of advertisement, techniques of developing the interactive media, and the way to construct, design, create and maintain the interactive advertisement. The course is preceded by means of lecturing related theory, case studies and literature review to allow students to be capable of interactive advertisement planning and analysis. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 進修教室，限 14 人，日職合開

description.zh: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul Saffo 未來思考與趨勢前瞻，有助於讓每一位同學思索未來社會可能轉變得新趨勢和新的需求。無論同學希望學習或專精的技能為何，如何應用 該技能，提前 選擇一個在未來對社會或個人更可能有所助益的方向練習、實作，不斷繼續前進，才能夠將個人的意義進一步投射至未來的社會價值中；如此一來，未 來社會也將會給給予你應有的報酬。未來思考的課程，將師承奇點大學客座教授，同時也是美國史丹佛大學設計學院特聘助理教授 Paul Saffo 的 Forecasting 課程，內容將有 - 現況觀察、趨勢分析、未來事件辯論、未來趨勢矩陣圖、前瞻思考經典賞析（包含文章與電影） 等。
description.en: 「Forecasting isn’t prediction.」- Paul SaffoFuture Studies & Forecasting will be more and more important skill for every young generation students. What will the future look alike? What is the driving forces pushing us from current to the future? How many pace layers of future arrivals?In this class, we will discuss Stanford consulting prof. Paul Saffo’s Future Studies & Forecasting methods, by – Observing current trends, future event debate, Matrices and Axes of Uncertainty, future mindset developing, etc.

notes: 進修教室，限 30 人，互動日碩 / 職碩 / 設計博合開

description.zh: 噪音基礎，噪音分析實驗法，汽車噪音法規與標準，基本噪音控制程序，車輛噪音與噪音控制基本，引擎噪音與控制，車輛噪音源，車輛噪音與改良，心理聲學與最佳化
description.en: Fundamentals of Acoustics, Experimental Methods of Acoustic Analysis, Automotive Noise Legislation and Standards, Basic Noise Control Procedure, Basics of Vehicle Noise and Noise Control, Engine Noise and Its Control, Vehicle Noise Sources, Vehicle Noise and Its Refinement, Psychoacoustic Analysis and Optimizations.

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 本課程教授系統分析之模擬方法應用於能源動力系統之穩態與動態分析 (malab)。內容包括能源系統個元件之特性分析與數學模型介紹，系統元件包括；壓縮機、渦輪機、熱交換器、與質子交換膜燃料電池系統。授課單元如下；1. 數值方法介紹 2. 能源系統元件數學模型與程式撰寫壓縮機   渦輪機   熱交換器 3. 能源系統分析範例；燃料電池系統分析流道 model、氣體擴散層 model、燃料電池質傳與電化學傳輸與程式範例
description.en: The course is a system analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations of lumped component system (matlab). These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:1.Numerical method 2.System components modeling Compressor   Turbine   Heat exchanger3.Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysisFlow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

description.zh: 建立節能車輛模擬平台，用以評估主系統與次系統之性能與響應關係，並以行車型態為例，分析能量管理系統、引擎、馬達、燃料電池、變速箱與不同儲能電池彼此之特性影響，進一步完成整車調校與控制策略之修正；介紹節能車輛中所使用數學模型與相關理論，進一步連結到學生在實務時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的物理反應現象。
description.en: Establish the energy-saving vehicle simulation platforms are developed in this study to evaluate performance and response between main system and subsystems. The driving cycles are adopted as an example and characteristics among energy management system (EMS), engine, motor, fuel cell, automated manual transmission (AMT) and Energy storage batteries are analyzed for further calibration and modification of control strategy. This course aims at teaching key mathematical models and related theories used in energy-saving vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the physical reaction phenomena observed.

name.zh: 節能車輛模擬與嵌入式系統
name.en: Energy-saving vehicle simulation and embedded system

notes: 日、職車輛所合開；人數上限 20 人；綜科 610

description.zh: 工程最佳化方法導論，線性規劃法，非線性規劃法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規劃法介紹，精密機電元件與系統之最佳設計。
description.en: Engineering optimization concepts,Linear progrsmming methods, Nonlinear programming Methods, Multi-objective optimization, Introduction to Modern mathematical programming techniques,Optimum design of precision machine components and systems.

description.zh: 以 C 語言為主的計算機應用程式設計，得包含：人機界面程式、即時多工程式、輸出入界面程式、多媒體程式、通訊及網路程式。
description.en: Computer programming using C language: programming of human-machine interface, real-time multi-task programming, input/output interface programming, multimedia programming, communicational and network programming.

description.zh: 微加工程序含 MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含 MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010 或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en: The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 1. fundamental metallographic concepts.2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.3. Hardenability 4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 逆向工程已成為電腦輔助產品開發技術重要的一環，透過三次元量測或掃瞄技術，取得工件表面的點資料，據以建構 3D CAD 幾何模型 (Geometric model)，以供後續設計、電腦輔助工程分析 (CAE) 與電腦輔助製造 (CAM) 之應用。逆向工程的程序分為三個階段：(1) 擷取工件表面的點資料；(2) 點資料的前置處理；以及 (3) 建構或更新幾何模型。依此流程，本課程首先講述各類運用於逆向工程中的量測與掃瞄技術，並以設計應用觀點為基礎，討論其間的差異與優缺點，隨著運用領域的不同，而採取不同的量測技術；其次介紹點資料前置處理的理念與方法，從現有文獻中，解析的相關的技術，因量測技術與策略的差異，而發展出不同的處理技術；至於，重建或更新原有的幾何模型的部分，將著重設計實務的應用，並與現有的 CAD 系統整合的策略。課程之目標，為使修習本課程之學生能對逆向工程的相關理論與技術，有全盤的認識與瞭解，並透過實際案例的操作，訓練學生能具備實務作業能力。
description.en: Reverse engineering has become an important tool for geometric model construction in 3D CAD based on the data points, digitized from an existing part, for the downstream applications such as CAE and CAM. The process of reverse engineering can usually be subdivided into three stages, i.e. (1) part digitization for capturing the data points; (2) data point pre-processing; and (3) CAD modeling and/or updating. In this course, the relevant techniques in the three stages of reverse engineering procedure are introduced firstly. Through the project practice, the student is able to adept to the techniques of reverse engineering.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 導論及 AI 之工業應用、類神經網路及專家系統搜尋法則、敘述邏輯、驗證、機器學習。
description.en: Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.

notes: 限 30 人，開學後如額滿將不再加選

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹 H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識 H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the theory of H∞ and how to utilize the mathematical tool to design the H∞ controller. Besides, the physical meaning and the comparison with others control methods are also will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 中文課程概述：本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 本課程主要讓學生了解文化差異對企業經營的重要性，課程主題包括：了解文化差異，全球工作生涯規劃，國際購併之跨文化議題，多文化之社會任，跨文化領導，跨文化通路與協商等。
description.en: The goals of the course are to understand the impact of culture on. The topics of this course are the followings: Understanding and Managing Cultural Diversity. International Assignments and Global Career Development. Managing Cultures in International Mergers and Acquisitions. Leading Responsibly in Multicultural Environment. Cross-Cultural Leadership. Cross-Cultural Communication and Negotiations.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生熟悉零售策略的基本概念，了解目前的零售產業之環境分析及零售趨勢之分析，探討零售行銷之區隔與定位，進而將零售策略如何應用於管理理論與實務分析。零售業包含百貨業、連鎖店、超市、超商等，與人們的關係極切，本課程主在探討如何經由零賣出使顧客滿意的商品。 內容：零售業概論、配銷通路、行銷研究、產品管理策略、定價策略、促銷策略、賣場規劃、零售業經營策略、顧客滿意 1. 具備零售管理學相關知識與概念。 2. 掌握零售業環境與趨勢之分析能力。 3. 具備零售業行銷區隔與定位的分析能力。 4. 具備零售策略應用於理論與實務之分析能力。
description.en: This masters-level course is designed to provide the student with a deeper understanding of retailing strategic management. Topics include: the world of retailing, electronic and no store retailing, the retail customer behavior, retail market strategy, retail location, merchandise management and store management. Retail management is mainly to discuss to sell goods through channels and satisfy them. The content of the course: Retail concept, physical distribution, market research, product management strategy, pricing strategy, promotion strategy, retail strategy and customer satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性。如何作好服務並使顧客滿意，達程服務創新。內容：服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、服務創新，個案討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service, satisfy customers and develop innovation service models. The topics of the course: Service concept, the service delivery system, Service facility and layout, productivity and quality improvement, forecasting, service quality, service strategy, customer satisfaction, service innovation, and case study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討因應產業環境變化下，企業經營模式之變革。 經營模式變革中，如何創新經營模式？是本課程主題。課中除了基本經營模式方法論外，產業個案教材是其重點。個案教材之課程進行將採哈佛大學個案教學方式實施。
description.en: This course aims to investigate the transformation of the business model, under the changes in the industrial environment. During business model transformation, how to innovate the business model Is the theme of this course. In addition to the basic business model methodology, the lesson will cover industry case materials. Case teaching materials into the curriculum will be taken to implement by the Harvard University case teaching way.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷實體通路以外的一個新興通路。使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。這個課程幫助企業在充分瞭解顧客信息的基礎上，針對客戶喜好，針對性地進行產品行銷，幫助企事業單位在激烈的市場競爭中取得競爭優勢。
description.en: Digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，必須具備宏觀的投資理財知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資理財之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，期望能制訂出最適的長短期投資決策，以獲取合理的投資報酬或超越市場績效表現。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of comprehensive investment management, this course combines information and software tools to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can provide students with skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting students to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market by working out the optimal short- and long-term investment decisions.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。

The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

description.zh: 近年來企業為面對市場的競爭與快速改變，其多以大型專案方式同時來執行幾個專案，如：產品研發、行銷規劃、生產製造及教育訓練等專案活動。大型專案管理要如何才能在企業統一的願景和策略下展開，來提升企業的競爭優勢與創造價值。因大型專案的時程較長且範圍較多，其不確定性和混淆性也較高，以致其成功的關鍵除須具備專案的執行的效率外，還須具有在於對變化的反應能力。本課程內容將著重於介紹大型專案規劃流程中所使用的技能與工具說明外，並安排學生企業內大型專案實務案例做為課堂內探討。其目的在訓練學生如何面對高混淆性和高不確定性的大型專案，使企業內大型專案管理有系統的方法執行與圓滿完成。
description.en: Recently, in order to face the challenges and rapid changes of the competition, enterprises often need have a large-scale project to execute several projects at the same time, such as product development, marketing planning, manufacturing, and education and training. How can large-scale project management be carried out under the unified vision and strategy of the enterprise? New capabilities and cultural consensus are needed to enhance the enterprise's competitive advantage and create value. Due to the long duration and large scope of large-scale project, its uncertainty and confusion are also high, so that the key to its success must be not only the efficiency of project execution, but also the ability to respond to changes.This course will focus on introducing the skills and tools used in the large-scale project, and arranging large-scale project practical cases in student companies as classroom discussions. Its purpose is to train students how to deal with large-scale project wit

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary?management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture

By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can provide students with skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting students to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market by working out the optimal short- and long-term investment decisions.

description.zh: Z - 轉換在數位控制之應用，取樣與訊號重整，狀態方程式，類比系統與數位系統之關係，穩定度分析，根值軌跡圖，時域下數位控制系統之控制器設計，頻域下數位控制系統之控制器設計，現代控制理論在數位系統之應用。
description.en: Course Title:Digital ControlDescription:To familiarize students with techniques of analyzingcomplex discrete-time systems in Time and Frequency domains. Toprovide students with the concepts and abilities of controller designfor complex discrete-time systems.

description.zh: 先修課程：工業電子學或負責教授同意。各種工業用感測器及設施自動化感測器結構、特性及工作原理，各種感測器之測量系統及界面電路設計，監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: Foundation Studies Programs: N/A.This course covers the measured systems, properties of active and passive converters, and applications of converters, such as acousto-optic converter, photoelectric converter, thermoelectric converter, piezoelectric converter, and so on. This course also convers interface technique, wheatstone bridge, variation, linearity, noise, and electromagnetic interference (EMI), especially for the EMI standards and controls of converters.

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 有關建築歷史、理論、批評、構造、營建管理等相關主題討論。
description.en: A theme topic discussion on the field of architecture history, theory, criticism, structure, construction and management, etc.

notes: 日、職建都所與建築四合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生深入探討最新的室內環境議題與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以單一類型的建築室內環境為探討主題；2. 探討環境影響人體健康之最新研究議題；3. 進行跨領域合作提出共同改善之策略及方法；4. 學習各項環境量測儀器之原理、操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善特殊室內環境議題之專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: In this course students are going to be taught how to discuss the relationship between indoor environment quality and human healthy in order to promote students' recognition and abilities to create healthy indoor environment.Contents :1. The indoor environment of single type of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Providing some strategies and methods to improve indoor environment quality through cooperating with other science field.4. Learning how to use instruments to evaluate indoor environment quality.5. Learning how to diagnose and improve the special topics of indoor environment quality.

name.en: Special Topics on Indoor Environment Quality

notes: 日、職建都所和設計博合開

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1. 概論 2. 文化遺產防災之重要性 3. 文化遺產防災之基本策略 4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式 5. 文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在強化有關都市土地使用規劃與成長管理的理論與經驗，以及增進對都市整體建成環境未來的瞭解。因此，本課程將藉由對都市土地使用規劃與成長管理經驗特有與一般課題、對策及創新作法的基礎瞭解，以培養理論與實務的知能。故本課程主要內容包括： 一、都市成長對土地的需求。 二、土地使用管制與倫理。三、都市變遷與規劃。四、都市成長管理與政府的角色。 五、達到都市成長管理的可能途徑。 六、都市成長管理體系內的必要措施：例如環境、交通運輸、住宅、財政、風險、信託、組織等。 七、結論。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with urban land use planning and growth management, and the struggle to define the collective future of our built environment. By identifying unique as well as common issues, problems, and innovations in urban growth management experiences, our hope is to improve planning practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1. Land needs for urban growth. 2. Land use control and ethics. 3. Urban change and planning. 4.Growth management and the role of government. 5. Alternative approaches to growth management. 6. Balancing planning needs in growth management systems: environmental, transportation, housing, financing, risk, trust and organization concerns. 7. Conclusions

name.zh: 都市土地使用計畫與成長管理
name.en: Urban Land Use Planning and Growth Management

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學施工安全與災害方面之基礎，以為將來投身土木建築工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含：擋土開挖、基礎施工、假設工程、結構主體工程、裝修工程、山坡地等施工安全與災害防制等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover:  Safety and disaster preclusion of  opencast ground、foundation construction、hypothesis engineering、structure engineering、fitment engineering   etc.

notes: 日職合開 / 夜間上課

description.zh: 為使土木營建背景的學生具備跨域學習與創用能力，本課程扣合當前重要時趨 (如 SDGs, ESG, LCA, ESDG/USR 等) 於土木與防災之低碳管理。擇採綠色與數位雙軸科技 (如數位碳盤查與減碳之智化物聯網 AIoT) 作為課程雙核心編排，介紹內容如碳 - 水 - 環境足跡之盤查與減碳策略、綠 - 智 - 健康之數位雲平台、無線感測與低工耗遠域網路等專案開發的理與例，以符綠智營建之踐履，以臻永續經管之倡議。為求哲科合一，課程亦將思與學之認識與方法作簡扼介紹 (系統思考與問題導向學習)。
description.en: To achieve interdisciplinary learning and innovative creativity for civil engineering students, this course presents the Carbon-Water-Environmental inventory associated with Artificial Intelligent/Internet of Things (AIoT) to meet sustainable development of civil engineering and disaster adaptation/mitigation. The contents in this class include sustainable development goals such as SDGs, ESG, LCA, ESDG/USR briefly, green-intelligent-healthy construction/maintenance and resilient projects, WSN (Wireless Network), LPWAN (Low Power Wide-Area Network), e-Cloud Management.Meanwhile, Systems Thinking (ST) and Problem-based Learning (PBL) , which are crucial for philosophy of science, would be introduced for this holistic approach.

name.zh: 土木與防災之低碳管理
name.en: Low Carbon Management of Civil Engineering and Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

notes: 本課程為未通過英文畢業門檻之課程

description.zh: 本課程旨在概述人工智慧的應用及其對製造業和物流業的影響。 隨機器學習、深度學習、啟發式演算法和其他人工智能方法的發展，相關新興技術的應用越來越多地被應用於製造和物流行業以提高決策能力。本課程將通過介紹人工智慧的基礎知識和實際應用之案例研究闡述使用人工智慧技術對於產業決策之幫助。學生將深入了解人工智慧技術及其在製造和物流領域如需求預測、生產計劃、調度、質量控製或運輸的潛在應用，課程內容亦將應用 ChatGPT 做為開發製造物流問題求解方法之輔助工具。通過本課程，學生將了解人工智慧對製造和物流系統之影響及現況，評估使用人工智慧之益處和局限性，並了解人工智慧對於相關產業之改善。
description.en: This course provides an overview of AI application and its impact on manufacturing and logistics. Emerging technologies like machine learning, deep learning, heuristics are being utilized to enhance decision-making capabilities. The course covers the fundamentals of AI, practical case studies, and its benefits. Latest AI technologies and their potential applications in manufacturing and logistics such as demand forecasting, production planning, scheduling, quality control, or transportation will be introduced. ChatGPT will be used as an auxiliary tool for developing problem-solving methods. The course develops the ability to analyze the impact of AI on manufacturing and logistics systems, assess benefits and limitations, and evaluate AI improvement for related industries.

name.zh: 人工智慧跨域製造及物流之應用
name.en: AI Applications in Manufacturing and Logistic

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開丙 10 人

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 1. Matlab/Simulink 簡介 2. 控制系統建模 3. 線性時變控制系統分析 4. 可觀測性與可控制性 5. 李亞普若夫穩定度分析 6. 曲線擬合與系統建模 7. 控制器設計 8. 數值範例演練
description.en: 1. Introduction to Matlab/Simulink2. Modeling of Control Systems3. Analysis of Linear Time-Varying Control Systems4. Observability and Controllability5. Lyapunov Stability Analysis6. Curve Fitting and System Modeling7. Controller Design8. Numerical Examples

description.zh: 本課程集總電路種類與電路定理，對電路元件及其一階電路、二階電路、二極體電路、驅動電路、保護電路、交流電路進行分析與設計。
description.en: This course collects circuit topologies and circuit theorems. And to analyze and design circuit components and their first-order circuits, second-order circuits, diode circuits, drive circuits, protection circuits, and AC circuits.

name.en: Analysis and Design of Electronic Circuit

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:1. engineering of materials2. forming of materials 3. traditional casting processes4. broaching and sawing5. turning and boring6. drilling and reaming7. milling and grinding8. machine tools 9. nontraditional machining

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 科研 243 / 資財一甲乙、二甲乙合開

description.zh: 本課程將延續財務工程導論的內容，將持續在債券與衍生性商品評價、避險以及風險控管等問題上繼續深入探討；本學期將把焦點放在債券投資的避險、股票衍生性商品與利率衍生性商品的評價與避險上，並利用 C (或 C++) 和 Matlab 兩種工具來執行樹狀結構，以評價選擇權的價值。
description.en: This course will still focus on the methods for bond and derivatives pricing and hedging, such as the evaluation of stock and bond options. For implementation purposes associated with the concepts introduced, such as the tree structure, two programming languages for computation will be provided: C (or C++ ) and Matlab.

notes: 科研 240 / 資財三甲乙合開

description.zh: 課程會涵蓋資訊能力與財金的整合來協助學生了解 FINTEC 服務。接下來透過設計思考來帶領學生透過設計一服務創新主題，讓學生以學習到的方法工具，進行實地演練，透過發表與評價，體驗完整的創新旅程，同時建立分組的創新作品集。
description.en: The course develops practical approaches for understanding and analyzing the servie of financial technologies (FinTech). The course will use design thinking to take students through the design of the User Experience (UX) and User-Interface (UI) of a product or service of their creation.

name.zh: 金融科技與服務創新流程

notes: 科研 243 / 資財三甲乙合開

description.zh: 資訊安全保險相關事故的理賠調查，使得數位鑑識在金融或資訊領域的重要性日益提升。數位鑑識與調查課程主要說明如何找到入侵或犯罪留下的可能的足跡，並介紹如何在合法與符合鑑識程序規範的前提下蒐集足夠的證據並保護這些有用的證據，以做為未來訴訟有效的佐證。在課程的設計上將以數位鑑識相關國際證照的領域與內容為主，除了教授學生數位鑑識的專業知識外，期能輔導學生取得數位鑑識相關證照。
description.en: The cyber security incident investigation for the cyber insurance has made digital forensics more and more important in the financial or information industry. This course focuses on identifying possible footprints of intrusions or crimes and collecting sufficient evidence and protect such useful evidence in order to be effective in future litigation. In the design of the course, the domain and content of the digital forensics international certification licenses will be mainly used. In addition to teaching the professional knowledge of digital forensics, it can also help the students obtain digital forensics certification in the future.

notes: 全英語 / 科研 240 / 資財四甲乙、資財所、創新資安、電資

description.zh: 企業常常是網路攻擊的主要目標，這門課程主旨在教育修課學生如何成功防禦常見的網路威脅並且確保自己的金融服務安全運作。本課程首先提供網絡安全的總體描述，指導同學了解目前面臨網絡威脅風險的一些最重要的服務和技術。熟悉該主題後，您將根據案例研究和現實生活場景探索特定技術和威脅。隨著同學們學習模組的進展，將發現漏洞和錯誤（包括人為風險因素），從而獲得有關最新威脅的專家級視野。然後，同學們將探索有關如何實現資料和基礎架構保護的資訊。在總結模組中，同學們將獲得流程和配置的最新重大更新，以及與基於資訊技術的金融服務中的網絡安全研究和開發相關的重要細節。在課程最後，同學們將接觸到並對未來資訊安全的技術有初步的了解，以及如何保護未來的金融服務與相關的基礎建設。同學們將會學到：?	了解企業所面臨之網路威脅？	探索如何辨識攻擊者？	呈現弱點評估、軟體測試、滲透測試？	使用緩解技術與補救計畫捍衛自己的金融網路？	實做加解密系統？	了解人工智慧如何影響網路安全
description.en: Enterprises have always been a target of cybercrime. This course teaches you how to successfully defend your system against common cyber threats, making sure your financial services are a step ahead in terms of security.The course begins by providing an overall description of cybersecurity, guiding you through some of the most important services and technologies currently at risk from cyber threats. Once you have familiarized yourself with the topic, you will explore specific technologies and threats based on case studies and real-life scenarios. As you progress through the modules, you will discover vulnerabilities and bugs (including the human risk factor), gaining an expert-level view of the most recent threats. You'll then explore information on how you can achieve data and infrastructure protection. In the concluding modules, you will cover recent and significant updates to procedures and configurations, accompanied by important details related to cybersecurity research and deve

notes: 全英語 / 科研 243 / 資財三四甲三四乙資財所、創新資安、

description.zh: 電腦稽核已廣泛的應用在金融交易，企業財務與進銷存流程與資訊系統的各項領域來協助找出瑕疵，降低與防範風險，並能做趨勢預測。本課程的目的將機器學習與人工智慧的技術應用在電腦稽核領域，主題包含：電腦稽核的流程，大量資料的整理與萃取，監督式與非監督式學習在稽核的應用，資料視覺化技術等。
description.en: Computer auditing has been widely used in financial transactions, enterprise business processes, and information systems, which is to help find flaws and reduce risks, and be able to predict trends. The purpose of this course is to apply machine learning technology in the field of computer auditing. Topics include Computer auditing related processes, the extraction and manipulation of large-scaled data, supervised and unsupervised learning in auditing applications, data visualization technology.

name.zh: 機器學習輔助電腦稽核

notes: 全英語 / 科研 240 / 資財四甲乙資財所、創新資安、電資資

description.zh: 企業常常是網路攻擊的主要目標，這門課程主旨在教育修課學生如何成功防禦常見的網路威脅並且確保自己的金融服務安全運作。本課程首先提供網絡安全的總體描述，指導同學了解目前面臨網絡威脅風險的一些最重要的服務和技術。熟悉該主題後，您將根據案例研究和現實生活場景探索特定技術和威脅。隨著同學們學習模組的進展，將發現漏洞和錯誤（包括人為風險因素），從而獲得有關最新威脅的專家級視野。然後，同學們將探索有關如何實現資料和基礎架構保護的資訊。在總結模組中，同學們將獲得流程和配置的最新重大更新，以及與基於資訊技術的金融服務中的網絡安全研究和開發相關的重要細節。在課程最後，同學們將接觸到並對未來資訊安全的技術有初步的了解，以及如何保護未來的金融服務與相關的基礎建設。同學們將會學到：?	了解企業所面臨之網路威脅？	探索如何辨識攻擊者？	呈現弱點評估、軟體測試、滲透測試？	使用緩解技術與補救計畫捍衛自己的金融網路？	實做加解密系統？	了解人工智慧如何影響網路安全
description.en: Enterprises have always been a target of cybercrime. This course teaches you how to successfully defend your system against common cyber threats, making sure your financial services are a step ahead in terms of security.The course begins by providing an overall description of cybersecurity, guiding you through some of the most important services and technologies currently at risk from cyber threats. Once you have familiarized yourself with the topic, you will explore specific technologies and threats based on case studies and real-life scenarios. As you progress through the modules, you will discover vulnerabilities and bugs (including the human risk factor), gaining an expert-level view of the most recent threats. You'll then explore information on how you can achieve data and infrastructure protection. In the concluding modules, you will cover recent and significant updates to procedures and configurations, accompanied by important details related to cybersecurity research and deve

notes: 全英語 / 科研 243 / 資財三四甲三四乙資財所、創新資安、

description.zh: 課程包含以下主題 1. 交流馬達簡介 2. 交流馬達機電能量轉換基礎 3. 磁性材料 4. 交流馬達繞線 5. 交流馬達設計原理 6. 交流馬達之有限元素分析 7. 交流馬達之機械設計
description.en: The contents of this course include:1. Introduction of AC motors2. Energy conversion and AC electric machine basics 3. Magnetic materials 4. AC electric machine winding 5. Design principles of AC electric machines6. Finite element analysis of AC electric machines 7. Mechanical design of AC electric machines

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程，其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 網路行銷包含資訊技術與行銷觀念，這門課希望融合者兩面的觀點，在使同學了解網路行銷的理論與實務，輔以資料分析之技術，介紹目前常用的推薦系統、客戶分群等行銷資料分析，此外，也輔以期刊論文的研讀來加強同學的學術理論基礎。
description.en: E-Marketing involves information technology and marketing. The course will explore information technology/systems concepts from a non-technical perspective and examine how the marketing function is influenced by emerging technology trends. In addition, some famous e-marketing technique would be introduced in this course including recommender system, customer segmentation and so on.  This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical bases

notes: 科研 243 / 資財四甲乙資財所合開

description.zh: 統計數據分析是一種利用數據對遇到問題進行適當推測的藝術 (有時是最好)，本課程是一門以微積分為基礎的統計學分析的入門課程，旨在幫助學生學習描述性和推論性的統計程序，以及在不同領域中使用有用的數據分析。在回顧描述性統計和一些必要的概率分佈後，我們將討論區間估計、點估計、假說檢定方差分析、線性回歸分析、因子設計、聚類分析的基本概念、分類和支持向量機，並伴隨著實踐和理論練習。因此這些技能將為學生提供一個基礎，培養學生獨自進行分析和有效評估他人統計分析結果的能力。
description.en: ‘Statistical data analytics’ is the art of using data to make appropriate (sometimes, best!) conjectures about problems encountered. This course is a calculus-based introduction to statistics and data analytics, and so designed to help students learn the introductory descriptive and inferential statistical procedures, and useful data analytics that are used in diverse areas. After a review of descriptive statistics and some necessary probability distributions, we will discuss interval and point estimation, hypothesis tests, ANOVA, linear regression analysis, factorial designs, and basic concept of cluster analysis, classification, and support vector machines accompanying practical and theoretical exercises. Consequently, these skills will provide the student with a basis to conduct their own such analyzes and to evaluate critically others’ uses of statistical analysis results.

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開丙 10 人

description.zh: 有鑑於電子商務的迅速發展，本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用免費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個電子商務的商業網站，無論同學自行創業或到公司服務，都可以因應電子商務的業務需求。
description.en: This course will teach the students to learn to build up an e-commerce website .

notes: 工管甲乙丙合開丙限 10 人

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL 系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10. 數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC 所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13. 使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14. 採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC 之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16. 微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。

Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

description.zh: 1. 基本 CMOS 邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS 基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS 基本邏輯閘佈局，4. 數位電路功能分析與模擬，5. 階層式的電路組成，6. 中小型電路設計，7.VHDL 系統，8. 認識 Cadence 系統，9. 圖形編輯設備的操作練習，10. 零件庫介紹，11. 設計電路之輸入編輯，12. 電路模擬實習，13. 數位電路的晶片設計，14. 電路自動化設計 15. 晶片製造專題。

Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

description.zh: １. 數值解之介紹：精確度與誤差觀念２. 插值及多項式３. 數值積分與微４. 數值線性代數５. 非線性方程式之解６. 曲線配合與函數近似７. 近似解理論８. 常微分方程式的數值解法９. 偏微分方程式的數值解法

description.zh: 1. 醫用電子學之基礎。2. 生醫電物理化學之基礎。3. 人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4. 生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5. 醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6. 量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7. 生醫電訊號處理技術。8. 超音波、紅外線、X 光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9. 醫用電子安全規格製訂。10. 醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7 醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12. 中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全 NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background   1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions   1.2 Solving recurrence relations   1.3 Mathematical induction2. Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness
