description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

description.zh: 設計科學研究重視創造與解決現實世界問題相關且實用的成品或服務。目標是開發具有實用價值並可在實務中實施的解決方案或進一步進行設計驗證。課堂進行方式，除了方法講解，將於課堂採用方法卡與結構化的課堂互動模式，深化學生對設計學在學術研究方法的認識與應用。學生將學會：1. 理解設計學的範疇與趨勢 2. 理解如何擬定研究命題與設計研究方法 3. 理解量化與質性研究方法 4. 理解研究結果的詮釋與視覺化 5. 擬定研究命題、研究框架、研究流程與方法
description.en: Design science research values the creation of finished products or service that are relevant and useful in solving real-world problems. The goal is to develop solutions that have practical value and can be implemented in practice or for further design verification. In addition to method explanations, method cards and a structured classroom interaction mode will be used in class to deepen students' understanding and application of design methods in academic research. Students will learn:1.Understand the scope and trends of design2.Understand how to formulate research propositions and design research methods3.Understand quantitative and qualitative research methods4.Understand the interpretation and visualization of research results5.Formulate research propositions, research framework, research processes and methods

name.zh: 設計學研究方法與實踐策略
name.en: Design Science Research Methods & Practical Strategies

description.zh: 藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活困難，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
description.en: This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.

name.zh: 跨域全齡商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Product Design for All Ages

notes: 工設一二、訓二、日職碩合開 (USR)；上限 7 人；設計 207

description.zh: 當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，智慧生產工程師需考量如何整合智慧製造與精實生產。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解智慧製造在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂精實導向的企業。
description.en: Since business are moving toward information and automation, smart production engineers need to consider how to integrate smart manufacturing and lean production. The goal of this course is to help students understand the application of smart manufacturing in the factory and to learn to build a so-called lean-oriented enterprise.

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開 甲乙 20 人  丙 10 人

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 `影像處理` 與電腦輔助計算處理，藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用 (如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度，受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵，後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業，除提昇製造業之產品品質外，對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

notes: 工管四甲乙丙 碩合開丙 10 人

description.zh: 課程主要內容介紹自動化科技之基礎知識與先進應用技術，並側重在自動化科技相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course introduces the fundamental theories and advanced technologies in the field of automatic and advanced technologies. The topics covered mainly in the areas of automation technologies, and related research areas.

description.zh: 一。電力設備的故障二。比壓器，比流器三。保護電驛的構造及動作原理四。常用的保護電驛五。發電機與電動機的保護六。變壓器的保護七。線路保護八。異常電壓的預防九。熔絲十。保護協調
description.en: <一>INTRODUCTION<二>WHAT REALLY IS THE MVA METHOD<三>THE ABC OF THE MVA<四>WHY THE MVA METHOD<五>COMPARISON OF THREE METHODS<六>CAN PHASE-GROUND FAULT BE SOLVED <七>MVA METHODS FOR INSTANTANEOUS VOLTAGE ESTIMATE<八>THE SIMPLE COMPUTER TIME SHARE PROGRAM<九>CONCLUSION

description.zh: 認識高頻電子電路動作原理並建立高頻電子電路設計能力，1. 傳輸線原理，2. 高頻元件，3. 散射參數，4. 史密斯圖應用，5. 小信號放大器，6. 低雜訊放大器，7. 射頻放大器，8. 振盪器，9. 混波與檢波，10. 功率分／合器。
description.en: 1.Transmission lineas2.High frequency component3.Scattering parameter4.Smith chart application 5.Small signal amplifier6.Low nosie amplifier7.RF amplifier8.Oscillator9.Mixers and detectors10.Power combiner/spitter

description.zh: 未來的自然語言處理技術應該是能讓機器以人為本的角度來了解人類語言。尤其人類是富有感情的，所以，機器必須能理解與應對人類的情感。本課程內容將從心理語言學出發，探討、比較人和機器如何處理語言。尤其是人如何透過文字和語音來表達不同情緒，然後運用機器學習、深度學習和人本資料資料探勘等技術，進行語音與文本分析，偵測辨識實際人類語言中的情緒，進而培養如何讓人工智慧能夠更貼近使用者需要的洞察力與處理能力。
description.en: In future natural language processing technologies, machines should understand language from a human-oriented perspective. Especially given that human beings have emotions, machines must be able to understand and respond to human emotions.The content of this course will be based on psycholinguistics. We will first explore and compare how people and machines deal with language, especially in terms of how people express different emotions through words and voices. We will then apply machine learning, deep learning and human-centered information data mining techniques to detect emotions in real human language.

name.zh: 自然語言處理與情感計算
name.en: Natural language processing and affective computing

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以 C 語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對 C 語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹 C 語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C 語言與物件導向：介紹 C++ 與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 瞭解各種數位邏輯閘，基本數位電路之特性及設計和應用，內容包含：1.TTL，CMOS 邏輯閘之特性實習，2. 組合邏輯電路設計實習含：算術電路，比較器，解碼器，編碼器，多工器，解多工器等，3. 序向邏輯電路設計實習含：正反器，計數器，記錄器，及移位暫存器等，.D/A 和 A/D 之轉換實習，5. 利用 ASM 圖之電路設計實習，6.PLD 設計實習，7.ORCAD/VST，PSPICE 數位電路模擬實習，8. 專題實作。
description.en: Experiments with various logic gates and basic digital circuits.Contents include:1.TTL and CMOS lab.2.Combinational logic circuit design lab.3.Sequential logic circuit design lab.4.D/A and A/D converters lab.5.PLD design lab.6.Digital circuit design lab.7.Special projects.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1. 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2. 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3. 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4. 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5. 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis2.Resistve circuit 3.Kirchhoff laws4.Thevenin and Norton theorem5.First and second order circuit6.Node and loop analysis7.Steady state response and analysis8.SPICE tool

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉轉換 2. 離散及快速傅利葉轉換 3.IFR 濾波器 4.FIR 濾波器 5. 專題
description.en: 1.Fourier Series and Transform2.DDFT and FFT3.IIR filter4.FIR filter5.Special projects

notes: 訓練場代開課，下學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 先修課程：4402025 或負責教授同意底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 共分車用電機 (含車用直流馬達、感應馬達、同步馬達及其驅動器介紹，馬達位置、轉速及扭矩控制)、車用電池技術 (含電池分類、電池化學、電池檢驗及測試、新式電池及燃料電池)、充放電系統 (發電機、充放電特性)、車輛電能管理四部份內容。
description.en: This course includes 4 parts: Vehicle electrical motor (DC Motor, Induction Motor, Synchronous Motor, and Motor Actuator, Control of Position, Speed, and Torque), Vehicle battery technology(battery types, electro-chemical technology, testing, alternative batteries, and fuel cell), Charging system (generator and charging characteristics), and Electrical energy management system.

description.zh: 先修課程：4402012 或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 字彙，文法，閱讀，解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐 "如同一個化學家的思考方式" 來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
description.en: Chemistry is fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping head to the equation or model that will follow.In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

description.zh: 介紹台灣軌道車輛現況及未來、軌道車輛名詞、轉向架與懸吊系統、軌道與設施、車輛動態、輪軌界面、推進傳動與制動、行控號誌、大眾捷運系統、輕軌電車、高速鐵路、軌道公司參訪。
description.en: This course is a basic course of railroad vehicle system.  Topics will be mentioned: railroad vehicles in Taiwan, terminology, bogie and suspension systems, rail and construction, vehicle dynamics, wheel and rail, drive / transmission and brake, train control and communication, mass rapid transit system, light rail transit system, high speed rail transit system, and tours in railway company..

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹生產業與服務業中之作業管理。其中包含預測、產品與服務設計、產能規劃、地點選擇規劃分析、存貨管理、及時系統與供應鏈管理、專案管理、及品質管理。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduction operation management in industry and service. It includes forecasting, product and service design, capacity planning, location selection and analysis planning, inventory management, just-in-time and supply chain management, project management, and quality management.

notes: 工管三甲乙丙，經管三合開，丙班 10 人

description.zh: 本課程目的在提升學生在科技與服務創新的知識及了解其各種不同的特性本課程旨在討論服務業可能衍生的經營策略，尤其是與網際網路相關的各種新興的服務產業。
description.en: This is an advanced course for Master students to enhance their theoretical foundation in Technology and Service Innovation. Issues involved are: Systematic View of Technology Innovation; Service Innovation; Service Management; New Service Development

description.zh: 本課程是針對高科技產業行銷管理的進階課程，目的是以行銷管理理論及案例討論方式，幫助學生熟悉高科技產業分析與行銷管理策略。關鍵概念包括傳統的行銷管理、高新技術產業 B2B 行銷管理、高科技導論、高科技企業之策略與企業文化、關係行銷、高科技企業之市場導向及研發與行銷的互動、高科技市場的行銷研究、了解高科技市場之顧客、高科技市場之後配銷通路與供應鏈管理、高科技市場之定價考量、高科技市場之廣告及促銷、及電子化企業及電子商務等研討。
description.en: This is an advanced course in marketing management for high-tech firms. The objective is to help students become familiar with industrial analysis and marketing management through marketing theories and cases. The key concepts include traditional marketing management, B2B Marketing Management, the introduction of high-tech Industry marketing, high-tech company's strategy and culture, relation marketing, marketing-R&D interaction, marketing research in high-tech markets, understanding high-tech customers, distribution channels and supply chain management, pricing consideration on high-tech marketing, advertising and promotion, E-business, case study, and term project.

name.zh: 科技政策與國家競爭力

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

description.zh: 本科目將由不可壓縮流體在各種流動環境所產生之流體分子流動現象之認識，進而利用各種有關因次群，熟習包含可壓縮流體在內之實際應用上所必須具備之基礎方法；如雷諾數．伯努力方程式等。利用流利基礎分析，流體機械之流場與動力，及管路內流場與壓力之變化。
description.en: Introduction to flow phenomena of incompressible flow, discussion on the dimensionless groups and their applicants, derive the conservation equations such as the Bernoulli equation, using fluid mechanics to analyze the field and the dynamics of fluid machinery, pipe and duct flow are also discuss.

description.zh: 智慧製造意旨透過資通訊及數位技術（例如數位控制、智慧機器人、自動光學檢測、雲端運算、人工智慧與物聯網等）的輔助，讓生產系統更具智慧，減少生產成本、提升產品品質與增加客戶滿意。本課程透過問題導向學習 (PBL) 方法，引導學生學習關於智慧製造之核心技術。
description.en: English description：The objective of smart manufacturing is to reduce manufacturing cost using information and communication technology, including digital control, industrial Robotics, automated inspection, cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and internet of thing (IOT). This course provides introduction of smart manufacturing and hands on practice about collaborative robot (Cobot) and manufacturing execution system (MES) operation under the framework of problem-based learning (PBL) model.

name.zh: 智慧製造 PBL 專題
name.en: Problem Based Learning, special topics in Smart Manufacturing

notes: 工管四甲乙丙 碩合開丙 6 人

description.zh: 本課程目的為訓練學生獲得在太陽熱能系統與製程應用領域上高階智識理論。課程教材含蓋數種太陽熱能轉換系統用以產生電能、熱水、冷暖氣與照明等用途，主要內容包括太陽輻射幾何學、追日型太陽能聚光器、太陽能史特靈發電系統、太陽能熱水器、太陽能冷暖氣系統、太陽能海水淡化、太陽能照明系統等等章節。期使學生未來能實際應用於各種不同太陽熱能轉換系統之規劃與設計。
description.en: This course aims to give graduate student a resource on the advanced principles and application of solar thermal energy system and processes. The material presented in the course covers several technologies for the conversion of solar thermal energy to provide electricity, hot water, heating, and desalination. The course outline mainly includes analysis of solar geometry and radiation, performance of sun-tracking solar concentrating collectors, solar stirling power system, solar water heating system, solar space heating and cooling system, solar optical lighting system. It hops that the student can apply the learned knowledge to the plan and design of many types of variable solar thermal energy system in year to come.

name.en: The technology and application of solar thermal energy system

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生實務能力，學生利用整學期至各相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: This course, off-campus practice, aims to provide practical training for undergraduate students through working in enterprise environments. During one semester, students go to enterprises or organization related to energy, air-conditioning and refrigerating industries and learn application-oriented skills. After completing the course, the organization for internship will provide training certifications and evaluate the score of students. The intern should write internship report and send the report to department office.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，使得傳統的商店與行銷環境受到衝擊。資訊科技改變了消費習慣與行銷通路，電子商務的效應已經開始影響商業活動的每個層面，從新產品的開發、銷售、到售後服務均受影響，為企業帶來了無限商機。根據資策會的報告顯示，網際購物市場目前正進入高成長期。網際網路的消費觀念逐漸普及，消費者端的網路交易市集，亦成為未來重要的網路商機。不僅 B2C 市場（企業對消費者）極具潛力，網友個體戶的開店創業風潮（C2C）更是在蓬勃發中。面對網路商業的來臨，有著大量的網路商業的人才需求。只要有正確的網路商業經營獲利模式，網路是一個可以賺到大錢的管道，尤其低門檻、低成本的網路拍賣場更是最佳踏板。本課程講授網路創業及網路商業的必要實務經營能力，讓同學在本課程裡學得如何快速的以最少成本來 DIY 速成個人事業及就業的能力。
description.en: Following the prevailing of the internet, the vigorous development e-commerce has given great impacts on traditional tangible stores and the whole marketing environments. Information Technology has not only changed our lives, but also changed consumers' behavior and marketing channels; and the e-commerce effect has already started to permeate into every stratum of business activities, including the exploitation, marketing, and after-sales service of new products, brings the industries infinite business chances. According to the reports of Institute for Information Industry, the market of internet shopping is going into its high development period, and there are a lot of chances to establish a new enterprise on the internet. So this course will teach about the internet entrepreneurial management.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 希望朝著技術訓練、實際運用與實驗性創作，三個層面進行課程上的交織鋪陳。在虛擬成像的關鍵技術上給予學生 3D 物件創作及影像合成的知識，並獲得自行研發與創造視覺效果的能力。在熟悉 3d 創作工具的同時，利用軟體本身多元並高度的掌控性，重組物理世界的運行法則，利用像是重力、碰撞、光影、質感等，並企圖創造出各種感知進化的契機。
description.en: By utilizing technical training, practical application and experimental creations as three aspects for intertwining in this courses. To offer the 3D object creation and image synthesis as the key techniques of virtual imaging for students knowledge development, and access to the ability of self researching and development for creating visual effects.While familiar this creative methods, using software itself as highly diverse controlling tools to reorganizing the rules of the physical world , such as gravity, collision, light, texture, etc., and attempting to create a variety of perceptual evolutionary opportunity.

notes: 進修部計中教室，限 30 人

description.zh: 化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐 "如同一個化學家的思考方式" 來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
description.en: Chemistry is fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping head to the equation or model that will follow.In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

name.zh: 電腦輔助工程分析及實習
name.en: Computer Aided Engineering Analysis and Lab.

notes: 限 11 人，日職合開，綜科 802

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。
description.en: Through this course—Introduction to Music, students would have a general understanding of music, understand the elements of music, technical theory and cultural background, at the same time in the music aesthetic to explore the composition of the standard, through exploring the different historical periods of humanistic background, to understand for the time that the idea of music composing and the impact of musical style development, as well as the development of music aesthetic concept of the evolution of the impact, based on discussing the development of music, the essence of art, and aesthetic meaning, to develop the concept of musical art, as well as a probe into the extension of aesthetic thought.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 這 e 世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題：1. 溝通管理定義與本質元素。2. 溝通管理內涵分析。3. 學習個人溝通能力。4. 學習溝通程序。5.e 化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6. 學習全球化溝通科技工具。7. 團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8. 塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1. 提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2. 激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3. 介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4. 建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1. 概論，2. 歌樂，3. 器樂，4. 儀式音樂，5. 舞蹈音樂，6. 戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 科研 243 / 資財一甲乙、二甲乙合開

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。此為連續兩學期之課程的一部分，包含 (A) 材料試驗、(B) 固力實驗、(C) 熱工實驗、(D) 流力實驗。不分順序，(A)、(B)、(C)、(D) 都需完成。
description.en: This is a part of a 2-semester courses in which (A) Materials testing, (B) Solid mechanics testing, (C) Thermal Lab and (D) Fluid Mechanics Lab Experiments are included. Sequence of (A), (B), (C) and (D) may be changed, but all of them have to be completed.

notes: 材料實驗 (B02) 熱工實驗 (綜科 428)

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持 "雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的 "重點教學法", 寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕 "Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是：" 理論和實際併重 "。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的 [自己動手做] 大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生了解現今專利權授予上較具爭議之課題。透過案例閱讀與討論，除使學生明白專利熱門議題外，也了解未來專利之發展趨勢。
description.en: The course provides some important issues, including animal and plant patents, traditional knowledge and genetic resources, computer software, business methods, as well as some recent cases, such as Apple sued HTC.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與 EMBA 學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發 EMBA 學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二必修，台北集中上課，國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-1 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 本課程設計的是鏈結 AOI 與雷射加工產業，與智能廠接軌共同來解決產業實際應產業之問題與需求。設計課程分成三階段，分別為課程講授、業師實作討論、業師實務專題，三階段前後銜接，循序漸進課程讓學全接觸 AOI 與雷射加工技術。第一部分課程講授主要為基礎之理論傳授，訂立實驗目標、計畫實驗過程、課後評量，予以教學反饋；第二部分實作與討論，採讓學進雷射相關的實驗設計與操作，融會貫通所學理論，培育其實作技能，藉由組與業師討論，練習規劃實驗，實驗安排由簡入深，從認識機台種類系統之光路架設、最終參數的調整等，並藉由組討論記錄表，予以教學回饋；第三部分為企業命題之實務專題，請業師提供產業實務問題，並由產業負責專題內容，讓學了解前業界發展向、業界現況與製程瓶頸等，將理論課程更實務鏈結到雷射應，期末進實務成果發表展與評選，培育其解決實務問題之能。
description.en: The first part of the course, classroom instruction, primarily focuses on imparting foundational theory, setting experimental objectives, planning the experimental process, conducting post-assessments, and providing instructional feedback. The second part involves hands-on practical work and discussions. Students engage in experimental design and operations related to laser technology, integrating the theoretical knowledge acquired earlier. Through group discussions with industry experts, they learn to plan experiments, starting with understanding different types of machinery, optical path configurations, and parameter adjustments. Discussion records are used to provide instructional feedback. The third part consists of practical projects based on industry propositions. Industry experts present real-world industry problems, and students work on projects related to these topics. This segment allows students to gain insights into industry trends, current industry conditions, and manufact

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其對學校評鑑相關議題的興趣，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in school evaluation. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in school evaluation.

name.zh: 獨立研究 — 學校評鑑

description.zh: (1) 塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2) 塑膠的成形方法；(3) 塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5) 射出成形模具的機構；(6) 射出成形模具零件規格與選用；  (7) 成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: "生成式人工智慧與多媒體應用" 這門課程主要探討如何將生成式 AI 技術應用於商業創作和多媒體製作流程。我們將介紹生成式深度學習模型，例如生成對抗網絡（GANs），探討人工智慧生成內容（AIGC）的議題，並著重於它們如何提升創作流程與工具操作的效率。我們將教授學生使用生成式人工智慧模型和多媒體相關平台，並將這些技術應用於內容產出，如圖像生成、影片內容和音樂創作等。此外，我們也將探討如何將這些新技術與傳統多媒體製作流程結合，以及如何操作相關軟體，並將討論相關的企業道德、社會和法律議題。這門課程適合對人工智慧、多媒體應用，以及如何將這些技術應用於商業環境有興趣的學生。
description.en: The "Generative AI and Multimedia Applications" course explores applying generative AI in business and multimedia production. It introduces generative deep learning models like GANs, discussing AI Generated Content (AIGC) and its role in enhancing creative processes. Students learn to use generative AI models and multimedia platforms for content production like image generation, video content, and music. It also covers the integration of these technologies with traditional multimedia production, software operation, and explores business ethics, social and legal issues. It's ideal for students interested in AI, multimedia applications, and their business applications.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧與多媒體應用
name.en: Generative Artificial Intelligence and Multimedia Applications

notes: 科研 243 / 英語 / 資財二甲乙合開

description.zh: 區塊鏈和數位資產是未來金融和科技領域的重要趨勢之一，本課程將介紹區塊鏈以及數位資產的基本知識與原理，並探討如何利用區塊鏈以及比特幣技術搭建新型態的金融基礎設施與永續的生態系統，內容包含 (1) 區塊鏈基礎；(2) 比特幣運作原理；(3) 穩定幣等數位資產；(4) 比特幣進階，含閃電網路、側鏈、智能合約層、永續挖礦… 等；(5) 實體世界資產 (RWA，Real World Asset)；(6) 區塊鏈分析；(7) 法規與監管… 等，為參與課程的學生建立正確的區塊鏈與數位資產的觀念。
description.en: Blockchain and Digital Asset are one of the important trends in the future of finance and technology. This course will introduce the basic knowledge and principles of blockchain and digital assets, as well as explore how to use blockchain and Bitcoin technology to build a new type of financial infrastructure and sustainable ecosystem, the content includes (1) Blockchain basics; (2) Bitcoin operating principles; (3) Digital assets such as stable coins; (4) Bitcoin advanced including Lightning Network, Rootstock, Stacks, sustainable mining...etc. (5) Real World Asset (RWA); (6) Blockchain analysis; (7) Regulations and supervision... etc., to establish a correct concept of blockchain and digital assets for students participating in the course.

notes: 李宜熹 2 (新聘)/ 資財三四甲乙、資財所合開

description.zh: 以深入淺出的方式，說明區塊鏈的技術及衍生的新商業模式，再進入以太坊區塊鏈的核心 - 智能合約，使學生能掌握 Solidity 程式語言，培養開發智能合約的能力，也能搭配 web3j、Ganache 等程式及工具，架設開發、測試的環境，並部署智能合約。更結合前端網頁及實務應用，創新創意或解決產業痛點，開發 DApp 實現解決方案。
description.en: Explain that the technology of the blockchain and the new business model derived, and then enter the core of the Ethereum blockchain-smart contracts.Let students master the Solidity programming language, cultivate the ability to develop smart contracts, and use web3j, Ganache and other tools to set up a development and testing environment, and deploy smart contracts.Combining front-end web pages and practical applications, innovative design or solving industrial problems, and developing DApp implementation solutions

name.zh: 智能合約及 DApp 開發

notes: 科研 240 / 資財三四甲乙合開

description.zh: 本課程將討論可持續發展的原則，結合了化學原理與最新的綠色化學技術，強調可再生資源的運用、廢棄物減量和環保製程。學生將學到如何設計具有較低環境影響的新型材料，探索綠色合成方法，以及瞭解綠色能源的應用。
description.en: This course explores the principles of sustainable development in green chemistry technologies, including renewable resources, minimizing waste, and employing eco-friendly processes. Students will acquire the skills to design innovative materials with a diminished environmental footprint, delve into green synthesis   and green energy.

description.zh: 國際商務市場行銷管理。包括在國際環境中的市場研究、定價、促銷和分銷。審查市場的問題出現不同程度的外資參與（出口，許可證，外國分公司）。先修課程：MARK5311 市場行銷。
description.en: Management of marketing in international business. Includes marketing research, pricing, promotion, and distribution in the international environment. Examines marketing problems arising from various degrees of foreign involvement (exports, licensing, foreign subsidiaries). Prerequisite: MARK 5311 (MARKETING).

notes: 碩二修，UTA-Narayan Janakiraman,1.7 輔課，1.11-15 正課

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 國際商務市場行銷管理。包括在國際環境中的市場研究、定價、促銷和分銷。審查市場的問題出現不同程度的外資參與（出口，許可證，外國分公司）。先修課程：MARK5311 市場行銷。
description.en: Management of marketing in international business. Includes marketing research, pricing, promotion, and distribution in the international environment. Examines marketing problems arising from various degrees of foreign involvement (exports, licensing, foreign subsidiaries). Prerequisite: MARK 5311 (MARKETING).

notes: 碩一修，5.18 (暫) , 中輔 5.24-27  Adwait Khare
